With file-based storage and no database required, it offers one-click Docker deployment and NAS compatibility for personal or intranet use.

summary.en: Afilmory is a modern, high-performance photo gallery platform for photographers, featuring S3/GitHub sync, EXIF metadata display, interactive maps, and a WebGL-based viewer. Built with React + TypeScript, it offers responsive masonry layouts, HDR support, Fujifilm recipe rendering, and both SaaS and self-hosting options.

summary.en: Input Leap is an open-source KVM software that enables keyboard and mouse sharing across multiple computers via software, mimicking hardware KVM switches. It supports Windows, macOS, Linux, and FreeBSD, allowing control switching by moving the mouse to screen edges or using hotkeys. Clipboard sharing is supported (except on Linux/Wayland). The project prioritizes simplicity, cross-platform compatibility, and open communication.

summary.en: A personal portfolio and blog built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, managed via Turborepo. Features MDX support, RSS, comments, view counters, and smooth animations with Motion. Delivers near-perfect Lighthouse scores in performance, SEO, and accessibility.

metadata.name: mcp-chrome

summary.en: Chrome MCP Server is a Chrome extension-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes browser functionality to AI assistants like Claude, enabling automation, content analysis, and semantic search. It runs locally, supports cross-tab operations, integrates 20+ tools, and uses SIMD-accelerated AI for faster vector processing.

summary.en: GPT-SoVITS is a powerful few-shot voice conversion and text-to-speech (TTS) system that enables high-quality voice cloning with just 1 minute of training data. It supports zero-shot and few-shot inference, cross-lingual synthesis (Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Cantonese), and includes a WebUI with tools for voice separation, dataset segmentation, and ASR. With fast inference (RTF as low as 0.014 on RTX 4090), it's ideal for personalized voice applications.

metadata.name: mcp-feedback-enhanced

summary.en: MCP Feedback Enhanced is an advanced MCP server designed for interactive user feedback and command execution in AI-assisted development. It features dual interfaces (Web UI & Desktop App), intelligent environment detection (SSH/WSL), cross-platform support, session tracking, auto-command execution, and rich Markdown summaries to boost development efficiency.

summary.en: Google AI Edge Gallery is an experimental app showcasing on-device generative AI use cases, enabling fully offline model execution on Android and iOS. Users can explore image understanding, audio transcription, prompt engineering, mini-games, and fine-tuned modelsâ€”all running locally without internet.

summary.en: This project demonstrates a fullstack app with a React frontend and a LangGraph-powered backend agent using Gemini 2.5. The agent dynamically generates search queries, performs web research via Google Search API, reflects on results to identify knowledge gaps, and iteratively refines searches to produce well-cited, comprehensive answersâ€”ideal for research-augmented conversational AI.

summary.en: Deep Research is a privacy-focused, AI-powered tool that generates in-depth research reports in minutes using various LLMs like Gemini, OpenAI, and Ollama. Deployable on Vercel and Cloudflare, it integrates SSE API and MCP server for flexible, secure, and fast research workflows.

summary.en: Open-Sora is an open-source initiative focused on efficient, high-quality video generation. The latest 2.0 version features an 11B-parameter model matching top-tier models in performance, with fully open training code and checkpoints, trained for only $200K, democratizing access to advanced video synthesis.

metadata.name: read-bridge

summary.en: MoneyPrinterTurbo is an AI-powered tool that automatically generates high-definition short videos from a single topic or keyword. metadata.name: FastGPT

summary.en: AnythingLLM is an all-in-one desktop and Docker AI application featuring built-in RAG, AI agents, a no-code agent builder, and MCP compatibility. It enables users to chat with documents by converting any content into LLM-usable context, with support for multi-user management and flexible LLM/vector database selection.

metadata.name: rag-web-ui

summary.en: RAG Web UI is an intelligent dialogue system leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology. It supports multi-format document ingestion, automatic chunking and vectorization, integrates with various LLMs (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Ollama), and offers a frontend-backend separated architecture with high-performance vector databases (ChromaDB/Qdrant) and OpenAPI support for private knowledge base Q&A.

It aims to purify the browsing experience with routing rules, plugins, and icon resources, including IP spoofing support (e.g., for Douyin), while promoting open-source ethics and responsible usage.

summary.en: This is the world's largest free and open-source Midjourney API proxy platform, generating over 1 million images daily. It supports drawing via Discord and Youchuan, offering full-featured APIs, distributed deployment, account pool management, real-time task tracking, Chinese prompt translation, content filtering, and one-click face swapping for images and videos, with an integrated admin UI and Swagger docs.

summary.zh: è¯¥é¡¹ç›®åˆ©ç”¨æ‰©æ•£æ¨¡å‹ä¸ºé»‘ç™½å›¾åƒä¸Šè‰²ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨LABè‰²å½©ç©ºé—´åˆ†ç¦»äº®åº¦ä¸é¢œè‰²ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚æ¨¡å‹åŸºäºUNetæ¶æ„ï¼Œåœ¨è®­ç»ƒæ—¶ä»…å¯¹ABé¢œè‰²é€šé“åŠ å™ªï¼Œä¿ç•™Lé€šé“ä½œä¸ºæ¡ä»¶è¾“å…¥ï¼Œå¹¶ç»“åˆç°åº¦å›¾ç‰¹å¾è¿›è¡Œæ¡ä»¶åŒ–å»å™ªã€‚é¡¹ç›®å±•ç¤ºäº†å‰å‘æ‰©æ•£ä¸å»å™ªè¿‡ç¨‹çš„å¯è§†åŒ–ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå›¾åƒä¿®å¤ä¸å†å²å½±åƒå¤åŸç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: This project uses diffusion models to colorize grayscale images by leveraging the LAB color space, where the L channel (grayscale) is preserved and only the AB color channels are noised during training. A UNet-based model denoises the color channels conditioned on the L channel and extracted grayscale features, enabling realistic color restoration for applications like photo restoration and archival imaging.

summary.en: AigoTools is an open-source tool for quickly building and managing website directories, featuring auto-crawling, internationalization, SEO optimization, and multi-platform image storage (e.g., MinIO, AWS S3). It supports one-click deployment via Docker or Zeabur, ideal for creating custom navigation sites.

It integrates Giscus for comments and NuxtUI for UI, featuring full-text search, WYSIWYG Markdown editing, friend link screenshots, and SEO optimization, deployed on Zeabur with cost-efficient containerization.

summary.en: Pic Smaller is a client-side image compression tool supporting JPEG, PNG, WEBP, AVIF, SVG, and GIF. Built with Vite + React, it leverages OffscreenCanvas, WebAssembly, and Web Workers for fast, secure local processing without server dependency. Features include format conversion, color reduction, and a drag-to-compare preview, optimized for both desktop and mobile.

summary.en: QuickRecorder is a lightweight, high-performance screen recorder for macOS built on ScreenCapture Kit. It supports recording screens, windows, apps, and mobile devices with features like driver-free audio loopback, mouse highlighting, and screen magnifier. Compatible with macOS 12.3+, it enables HEVC with Alpha recording, real-time presenter overlay (macOS 14), and independent system/microphone audio track control for post-editing.

summary.en: Auto.js is an Android-based JavaScript automation IDE leveraging accessibility services for UI control operations, screenshot analysis, OCR, and on-device AI inference (YOLOv8, PaddleOCR, ONNXRuntime). This modified version fixes memory leaks, enhances Android 12 support, and integrates multiple inference engines for stable automation in apps like Ant Forest.

summary.zh: FunClip æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºã€ç²¾å‡†ä¸”æ˜“ç”¨çš„è§†é¢‘è¯­éŸ³è¯†åˆ«ä¸å‰ªè¾‘å·¥å…·ï¼ŒåŸºäºé˜¿é‡Œäº‘é€šä¹‰è¯­éŸ³å®éªŒå®¤çš„ FunASR æ¨¡å‹å®ç°é«˜ç²¾åº¦è¯­éŸ³è½¬å†™ï¼Œå¹¶æ”¯æŒé€šè¿‡ LLM å®ç°æ™ºèƒ½å‰ªè¾‘ã€‚ç”¨æˆ·å¯è‡ªç”±é€‰æ‹©æ–‡æœ¬ç‰‡æ®µæˆ–æŒ‡å®šè¯´è¯äººè¿›è¡Œè§†é¢‘è£å‰ªï¼Œé›†æˆ Paraformerã€CAM++ ç­‰å·¥ä¸šçº§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä¸­è‹±æ–‡è¯†åˆ«ã€çƒ­è¯å¢å¼ºä¸å¤šæ®µå‰ªè¾‘ï¼Œæä¾› Gradio äº¤äº’ç•Œé¢ï¼Œé€‚åˆæœ¬åœ°éƒ¨ç½²ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨è®¿é—®ã€‚
summary.en: FunClip is an open-source, accurate, and user-friendly video speech recognition and clipping tool powered by Alibaba's FunASR models. It enables precise ASR with timestamp prediction, supports LLM-based intelligent clipping via Qwen/GPT, allows speaker-specific trimming using CAM++, and offers hotword customization. With Gradio interface, it supports multi-segment clipping, SRT subtitle export, and local/server deployment for both Chinese and English content.

It handles JavaScript rendering, dynamic content, media parsing (PDFs, DOCX, images), batch processing, and user actions like clicks and scrolls, offering high reliability and customization for AI agents and knowledge systems.

summary.en: MediaCrawler is a multi-platform content scraping tool powered by Playwright, supporting data collection from major Chinese social platforms like Xiaohongshu, Douyin, Kuaishou, Bilibili, Weibo, Tieba, and Zhihu. summary.en: How To Ask Questions The Smart Way is a classic guide by Eric S. Raymond on how to effectively ask technical questions to get useful answers. metadata.name: Open-Assistant

summary.en: kafka-python is a full-featured Python client for Apache Kafka, compatible with versions 0.8 to 4.0. summary.en: django-notifications is a Django app mimicking GitHub's notification system, designed for user-centric event alerts. summary.en: A Telegram bot designed to distribute localized language files for Telegram clients. It allows uploading translation files, retrieving file IDs, and assigning them to Android, iOS, or Desktop platforms via simple commands, streamlining the localization workflow.

metadata.name: django-persistent-messages
metadata.description: A Django app for unified and persistent user messages/notifications, built on top of Django's messages framework

summary.zh: Django Persistent Messages æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Django æ¶ˆæ¯æ¡†æ¶çš„æ‰©å±•åº”ç”¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸é€šçŸ¥ã€‚è®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å¯å­˜å‚¨äºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå®ç°è·¨ä¼šè¯çš„â€œç²˜æ€§â€æé†’ï¼Œç›´è‡³ç”¨æˆ·ä¸»åŠ¨æ ‡è®°ä¸ºå·²è¯»ï¼›åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·ä»ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤ä¼šè¯æœºåˆ¶ã€‚æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€ APIï¼Œæ”¯æŒå±å¹•å±•ç¤ºä¸é‚®ä»¶é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œå¢å¼ºæ¶ˆæ¯è§¦è¾¾ç‡ã€‚
summary.en: Django Persistent Messages extends Django's messaging framework to support persistent, cross-session user notifications. Authenticated users' messages are stored in the database and remain visible until marked as read, while anonymous users rely on session-based storage. It offers a unified API for both user types and supports on-screen display and email notifications.

metadata.name: django-persistent-messages
metadata.description: My independent fork of django-persistent-messages. A Django app for unified and persistent user messages/notifications, built on top of Django's messages framework

summary.zh: Django Persistent Messages æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Django æ¶ˆæ¯æ¡†æ¶çš„æ‰©å±•åº”ç”¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸é€šçŸ¥ã€‚å®ƒå…è®¸è®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å­˜å‚¨äºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå®ç°è·¨ä¼šè¯ä¿ç•™ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›æ ‡è®°å·²è¯»ã€åˆ é™¤ç­‰äº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·ä»ä½¿ç”¨ä¼šè¯å­˜å‚¨ã€‚è¯¥åº”ç”¨æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€ APIï¼Œå…¼å®¹ Django åŸç”Ÿæ¶ˆæ¯ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¾¿äºé›†æˆã€‚
summary.en: Django Persistent Messages is a Django app extending the built-in messages framework to support persistent user notifications. It stores messages in the database for authenticated users, enabling cross-session persistence with features like marking as read or deletion. Anonymous users use session-based storage. Offers a unified API compatible with Django's native messaging system.

metadata.name: django-monitio
metadata.description: Unified, persistent user messages with live notifications via SSE for Django.

summary.zh: django-monitio æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º Django æä¾›æŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸å®æ—¶é€šçŸ¥çš„æ‰©å±•ï¼ŒåŸºäº Redis å’Œ SSE å®ç°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å­˜å‚¨ä¸æ¨é€ã€‚æ”¯æŒè®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ•°æ®åº“æŒä¹…åŒ–æ¶ˆæ¯ã€åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¼šè¯æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œå¹¶é›†æˆé‚®ä»¶é€šçŸ¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚é¡¹ç›®ä¾èµ– django-sseã€django-redis ç­‰ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºéœ€è¦è·¨ä¼šè¯æ¶ˆæ¯ç®¡ç†çš„ Web åº”ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: django-monitio is a Django extension for persistent user messages and live notifications via Server-Sent Events (SSE), backed by Redis. It supports database-stored messages for authenticated users and session-based messages for anonymous users, with optional email delivery. Built on django-sse and django-redis, it enables cross-session message management in web applications.

metadata.name: wallop

summary.en: Wallop is a minimal (4KB), dependency-free JavaScript library for showing and hiding elements, ideal for sliders and carousels. It manages state by adding semantic CSS classes, with animations handled entirely in CSS. It supports mobile-first design, progressive enhancement, custom events, and offers flexible APIs with built-in animation modifiers.

summary.en: qiandao is an automated check-in framework based on HAR editor, enabling multi-site auto-check-in via templates. It offers a web interface and CLI tool, supports Docker deployment, requires Python 3.11, and optionally uses Redis or MySQL. Users can upload custom templates, with admin approval for public sharing, ideal for batch website check-in management.

summary.en: GetCookies is a Chrome extension that bypasses HTTP ONLY restrictions to retrieve cookies from specified domains. It triggers via buttons with custom data attributes, supports filtering by domain and cookie name, and returns cookie data in JSON format through message event callbacks, ideal for automation tasks like daily check-ins.

summary.en: Hexo is a fast, simple, and powerful blog framework powered by Node.js. It supports GitHub Flavored Markdown, offers one-command deployment to platforms like GitHub Pages, and features a rich ecosystem of themes and plugins for building static blogs efficiently.

summary.en: Django is a high-level Python web framework designed for perfectionists with deadlines. It promotes rapid development, clean architecture, and secure deployment, featuring built-in ORM, authentication, and admin interface for scalable enterprise applications.

metadata.name: GeekBlog

summary.en: GeekBlog is a full-featured blog system built on Django 1.6.5, supporting dual database storage with MySQL and MongoDB. It integrates UEditor for rich text editing, Duoshuo for comments, and enhances Django Admin with django-admin-tools. Features include responsive design, static asset optimization via Django Pipeline, RSS feeds, and sitemap generation.

summary.en: django-guardian is a Django extension that implements per-object permissions on top of Django's built-in authentication system. It enables fine-grained access control by allowing permissions to be assigned to users or groups for specific model instances, with seamless integration into Django Admin via GuardedModelAdmin.

summary.en: This is a modern personal portfolio built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript (strict mode), managed via Turborepo. It supports Markdown/MDX publishing, RSS feeds, sitemaps, comments, reading time, and view counters. Features smooth scroll-based animations and transitions using Motion, achieving near-perfect Lighthouse scores in performance, accessibility, and SEO.

The project covers foundational principles, architectural design, and operational optimization, aiding developers in achieving efficient context management within multi-agent architectures to enhance overall system performance.

summary.en: HivisionIDPhotos is a lightweight and efficient AI tool for generating ID photos, designed to provide a fast and systematic solution for photo creation. The project supports recognition and segmentation in various shooting scenarios, generating standard ID photos of different specifications, with features like beautification and smart outfit change. Users can opt for pure offline or edge-cloud inference, making it suitable for both personal and commercial use, addressing urgent ID photo needs.

Users can easily configure features like automatic chatting, job information scraping, and reminders for unread messages, enabling quick resume submissions and follow-ups. Open-source and free, it caters to job seekers of all levels, enhancing efficiency and reducing friction in job searching.

summary.en: AIStudioToAPI is a tool that wraps Google AI Studio into APIs compatible with OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic. It utilizes browser automation to interact with the AI Studio web interface, supporting multi-account login and tool calls, making it ideal for developers needing to integrate various AI models. The project offers straightforward deployment options, including Docker and local execution, for quick user onboarding.

summary.en: OpenSpec is a spec-driven development (SDD) framework for AI coding assistants, designed to streamline the software development process. It supports flexible scaling from personal projects to enterprise applications, adopting an iterative rather than waterfall approach. Users can interact with AI through simple commands to quickly propose features and automatically generate related documentation and task lists, enhancing development efficiency.

summary.en: Claude Code Hub is a modern API proxy service platform designed for teams, offering intelligent load balancing, user management, and real-time monitoring. Built on a tech stack of Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Redis, it supports multiple AI service providers, ensuring request stability and security. Key features include automated documentation generation, rate limiting, and comprehensive analytics, making it ideal for development teams needing efficient management of AI interfaces.

summary.en: Poco Agent is a beautiful and user-friendly alternative to OpenClaw, featuring a secure sandbox runtime and built-in instant messaging support. Its attractive web interface is mobile-friendly, allowing users to control their agent from anywhere. The project requires no complex setup, supports asynchronous and scheduled tasks, and offers robust extensibility, making it ideal for users seeking secure, flexible, and efficient automation.

summary.en: CCG is a multi-model collaboration development toolkit based on Claude Code CLI, integrating Codex and Gemini backend capabilities. It offers intelligent routing, code review, and over 17 commands for efficient management and execution of frontend and backend tasks, enhancing team collaboration efficiency for complex projects.

summary.en: Oh My Codex (OMX) is a multi-agent orchestration layer for OpenAI Codex CLI, transforming Codex from a single-session agent into a coordinated system. It supports complex task execution and persistent state management through role prompts, workflow skills, and team orchestration, making it ideal for structured and long-running development scenarios. OMX enhances Codex's capabilities and provides convenient CLI tools for efficient collaboration and management.

summary.en: llmfit is a terminal tool that right-sizes large language models (LLMs) to your system's RAM, CPU, and GPU. It supports 497 models and 133 providers, evaluating models across quality, speed, and fit dimensions to help users find the best-suited models for their hardware. The tool features an interactive terminal user interface (TUI) and classic CLI mode, supporting multi-GPU setups and dynamic quantization selection, making it ideal for developers and researchers needing efficient model deployment.

It functions as a general-purpose assistant capable of executing various tasks while improving efficiency through persistent memory. Key features include compatibility with OpenAI, Anthropic, and Gemini APIs, weight-based scheduling, a visual management interface, and built-in rate limiting, making it ideal for developers and enterprises needing to integrate multiple LLM services.

With an elegant UI and comprehensive request analytics, Octopus is ideal for developers and businesses looking to integrate various LLM services.

summary.en: This project is a social media agent that generates Twitter and LinkedIn posts based on a given URL. summary.en: The DingTalk Revoke Message Patcher for PC is a plugin designed for DingTalk desktop versions 6.0 and above, offering various message revocation prevention features, including protection for text, image, file, and voice messages. It supports features like never marking messages as read and watermark removal, making it ideal for users who need to retain important communication content, particularly in work and team collaboration scenarios, ensuring information integrity and traceability.

summary.en: The RAG From Scratch project aims to expand the knowledge base of large language models (LLMs) through Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) technology, addressing their limitations in handling private or recent information. It offers a series of notebooks alongside video tutorials that gradually delve into the fundamentals of indexing, retrieval, and generation, making it suitable for developers and researchers looking to master RAG techniques.

summary.en: BigBanana AI Director is an innovative AI platform for generating short films and motion comics, designed to provide creators with an automated production workflow from script to final output. By adopting an industrial "Script-to-Asset-to-Keyframe" approach, users can precisely control character consistency and scene continuity, quickly visualizing their creative ideas. The platform integrates advanced AI models for intelligent script breakdown and visual translation, significantly enhancing creative efficiency.

summary.en: VoltAgent is an end-to-end AI Agent Engineering Platform built on an open-source TypeScript framework. It offers features like memory, tools, and workflows, allowing integration with various AI providers for building intelligent agents and multi-agent systems. The VoltOps console provides observability, automation, and deployment capabilities, aiding developers in efficiently managing and operating agents.

summary.en: KoalaQA is an open-source intelligent after-sales service platform driven by AI large models, offering capabilities such as AI customer service, search, and operations. It helps enterprises quickly build Q&A communities and self-service systems. By automating customer service, KoalaQA significantly reduces operational costs and enhances customer satisfaction, aiming to achieve Zero Contact Resolution (ZCR) in various service scenarios.

summary.en: Videocut Skills is a video editing agent built on Claude Code Skills, specifically designed for spoken videos. It addresses the limitations of traditional editing tools by leveraging semantic understanding to identify errors and repetitions, while a custom dictionary enhances subtitle quality. The tool automatically detects silence, repeated phrases, and in-sentence repetitions, offering an efficient AI-assisted editing experience that significantly simplifies the video post-production process.

By analyzing subtitle content, the AI automatically generates effect suggestions, which can be rendered with a single click after user approval, enhancing the viewing experience and information delivery. It supports various visual components and themes, suitable for education, business, and creative fields.

Key highlights include open APIs, real-time synchronization, and flexible permission controls.

summary.zh: LingBot-VLA æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®ç”¨çš„è§†è§‰-è¯­è¨€-åŠ¨ä½œåŸºç¡€æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œä¸“æ³¨äºå¤§è§„æ¨¡é¢„è®­ç»ƒæ•°æ®å’Œé«˜æ•ˆè®­ç»ƒã€‚å®ƒåˆ©ç”¨æ¥è‡ªä¹ç§æµè¡ŒåŒè‡‚æœºå™¨äººé…ç½®çš„ 20,000 å°æ—¶çœŸå®ä¸–ç•Œæ•°æ®ï¼Œå±•ç°å‡ºåœ¨æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå’Œç°å®åŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•ä¸­çš„æ˜¾è‘—ä¼˜åŠ¿ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å‹åœ¨è®­ç»ƒæ•ˆç‡ä¸Šè¾ƒç°æœ‰ VLA ä»£ç åº“å®ç°äº† 1.5 è‡³ 2.8 å€çš„åŠ é€Ÿï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºæœºå™¨äººæ§åˆ¶å’Œäººæœºäº¤äº’ç­‰åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: LingBot-VLA is a pragmatic Vision-Language-Action foundation model that focuses on large-scale pre-training data and efficient training. It leverages 20,000 hours of real-world data from nine popular dual-arm robot configurations, demonstrating significant superiority in simulation and real-world benchmarks. The model achieves a 1.5 to 2.8 times speedup in training efficiency compared to existing VLA codebases, making it suitable for applications in robotic control and human-robot interaction.

summary.en: LingBot-World is an open-source world simulator focused on video generation technology. It offers high-fidelity and diverse environments, supports long-term memory and contextual consistency, and can generate images at 16 frames per second in real-time interactivity. The project aims to bridge the gap between open-source and closed-source technologies, facilitating applications in content creation, gaming, and robot learning.

summary.en: Excalidraw is an open-source virtual whiteboard that supports hand-drawn style diagram creation, ideal for team collaboration and creative expression. Key features include an infinite canvas, real-time collaboration, end-to-end encryption, and a wide range of drawing tools, allowing users to easily create and share hand-drawn style graphics suitable for design, education, and brainstorming.

summary.en: openOii is an AI agent-based comic drama generation platform that automatically transforms user creative stories into complete video works. By leveraging collaboration among multiple specialized AI agents, the platform facilitates script writing, character design, storyboard creation, and video generation, supporting real-time feedback and precise regeneration, making it suitable for creative production, education, and entertainment.

summary.zh: æ‰ä»“ä¸­åŒ»å¤§æ¨¡å‹è‡´åŠ›äºæ¨åŠ¨å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹åœ¨ä¼ ç»Ÿä¸­åŒ»é¢†åŸŸçš„åº”ç”¨ï¼Œè¾…åŠ©åŒ»ç”Ÿè¯Šæ–­å’Œæ‚£è€…è‡ªæˆ‘è¯„ä¼°ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å‹åŸºäºQwen2/2.5ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ä¸¤é˜¶æ®µè®­ç»ƒæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå·²åœ¨ä¸­åŒ»è¾¨ç—…è¾¨è¯ç­‰ä»»åŠ¡ä¸­å–å¾—å…ˆè¿›æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨åŒ»å­¦æ‰§ç…§è€ƒè¯•ä¸­è¡¨ç°ä¼˜å¼‚ã€‚å¼€æºçš„æ¨¡å‹æƒé‡åŒ…æ‹¬å¤šä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨æå‡ä¸­åŒ»åŒ»ç–—æ°´å¹³å’Œä¼ æ‰¿ã€‚
summary.en: BianCang Traditional Chinese Medicine Model aims to advance the application of large language models in traditional Chinese medicine, assisting doctors in diagnosis and patients in self-assessment. Based on Qwen2/2.5, it employs a two-stage training method, achieving state-of-the-art performance in TCM diagnosis tasks and excelling in medical licensing exams. The open-sourced model weights include multiple versions, aimed at enhancing TCM healthcare and heritage.

summary.zh: æ˜åŒ»ï¼ˆMINGï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºåŒ»ç–—æŒ‡ä»¤å¾®è°ƒçš„ä¸­æ–‡åŒ»ç–—é—®è¯Šå¤§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨æä¾›ç²¾å‡†çš„åŒ»ç–—é—®ç­”å’Œæ™ºèƒ½é—®è¯ŠæœåŠ¡ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å‹æ”¯æŒå¤šè½®é—®è¯Šï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿåˆ†æåŒ»ç–—æ¡ˆä¾‹å¹¶ç»™å‡ºè¯Šæ–­å»ºè®®ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºåŒ»ç–—è¡Œä¸šçš„æ™ºèƒ½å®¢æœå’Œåœ¨çº¿é—®è¯Šåœºæ™¯ã€‚å…¶æŠ€æœ¯äº®ç‚¹åœ¨äºç»“åˆäº†ç¨€ç–æ··åˆä½ç§©é€‚é…å™¨ä¸“å®¶çš„å¤šä»»åŠ¡å­¦ä¹ æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæå‡äº†æ¨¡å‹çš„åŒ»ç–—é—®ç­”èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚
summary.en: MING is a Chinese medical consultation large model based on medical instruction fine-tuning, designed to provide accurate medical Q&A and intelligent consultation services. The model supports multi-turn consultations, analyzing medical cases and offering diagnostic suggestions, making it suitable for smart customer service and online consultation in the healthcare industry. Its technical highlight lies in the integration of sparse mixture of low-rank adapter experts for enhanced multi-task learning in medical Q&A.

metadata.name: Zhongjing
metadata.description: A Chinese medical ChatGPT based on LLaMa, training from large-scale pretrain corpus and multi-turn dialogue dataset.

summary.zh: ä»²æ™¯æ˜¯é¦–ä¸ªå®ç°ä»é¢„è®­ç»ƒåˆ°å¼ºåŒ–å­¦ä¹ ä¸äººç±»åé¦ˆï¼ˆRLHFï¼‰å…¨æµç¨‹è®­ç»ƒçš„ä¸­æ–‡åŒ»ç–—å¤§æ¨¡å‹ï¼ŒåŸºäºLLaMaæ¶æ„ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºå‡ºä¼˜å¼‚çš„å¯¹è¯èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å‹ç»è¿‡70,000æ¡çœŸå®åŒ»æ‚£å¯¹è¯æ•°æ®é›†çš„è®­ç»ƒï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿåœ¨å¤šè½®å¯¹è¯ä¸­æ¥è¿‘ä¸“ä¸šåŒ»ç”Ÿæ°´å¹³ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºåŒ»ç–—å’¨è¯¢ã€å¥åº·å»ºè®®ç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚å…¶ç‹¬ç‰¹ä¹‹å¤„åœ¨äºç»“åˆä¸»åŠ¨åŒ»ç–—è¯¢é—®èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œæå‡äº†æ¨¡å‹çš„å®ç”¨æ€§ä¸å®‰å…¨æ€§ã€‚
summary.en: Zhongjing is the first Chinese medical large model that implements a complete training process from pre-training to Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback (RLHF), based on the LLaMa architecture. It demonstrates excellent dialogue capabilities and has been trained on a dataset of 70,000 real doctor-patient conversations, approaching the level of professional doctors in multi-turn dialogues. Its uniqueness lies in enhancing proactive medical inquiry abilities, improving the model's practicality and safety.

Inspired by the profound wisdom of the ancient Chinese medical master Zhang Zhongjing, it is a pre-trained large language model designed specifically for the field of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

summary.zh: CMLM-ZhongJingæ˜¯é¦–ä¸ªä¸“ä¸ºä¼ ç»Ÿä¸­åŒ»é¢†åŸŸè®¾è®¡çš„å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œçµæ„Ÿæºè‡ªå¤ä»£åŒ»å®¶å¼ ä»²æ™¯ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å‹é€šè¿‡å¤šä»»åŠ¡è¯Šç–—åˆ†è§£ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œç»“åˆè¶…è¿‡13.5ä¸‡æ¡ä¸“ä¸šæŒ‡ä»¤æ•°æ®ï¼Œå±•ç°å‡ºè‰¯å¥½çš„è·¨ä¸“ç§‘æ³›åŒ–èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§è¯Šç–—åœºæ™¯ã€‚å…¶è½»é‡çº§éƒ¨ç½²ç‰¹æ€§ä½¿å¾—åœ¨å•å¼ GPUä¸Šå®ç°é«˜é€Ÿæ¨ç†æˆä¸ºå¯èƒ½ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨ä¸ºä¸­åŒ»è¯é¢†åŸŸæä¾›å¯é çš„æ™ºèƒ½å·¥å…·ã€‚
summary.en: CMLM-ZhongJing is the first large language model specifically designed for Traditional Chinese Medicine, inspired by the ancient physician Zhang Zhongjing. Utilizing a multi-task diagnosis strategy and over 135,000 professional instruction data, it demonstrates strong cross-disciplinary generalization capabilities across various diagnostic scenarios. Its lightweight deployment allows for high-speed inference on a single GPU, aiming to provide reliable intelligent tools for the TCM field.

summary.en: AxonHub is an open-source AI gateway that allows seamless switching between over 100 large language models (LLMs) without code changes. Its core value lies in eliminating vendor lock-in, simplifying integration complexity, and providing comprehensive request tracing and real-time cost control, making it ideal for developers and enterprises needing flexible access to various AI models.

summary.zh: Aether æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾è‡ªæ‰˜ç®¡çš„ AI API ç½‘å…³ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Claudeã€OpenAIã€Gemini ç­‰å¤šç§ AI æœåŠ¡çš„ç»Ÿä¸€æ¥å…¥å’Œç®¡ç†ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½åŒ…æ‹¬å¤šç§Ÿæˆ·ç®¡ç†ã€æ™ºèƒ½è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡å’Œå¥åº·ç›‘æ§ï¼Œè‡´åŠ›äºä¸ºç”¨æˆ·æä¾›é«˜æ•ˆã€çµæ´»çš„ AI æœåŠ¡åŸºç¡€è®¾æ–½ã€‚é€‚åˆå›¢é˜Ÿå’Œä¸ªäººä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Docker éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œç®€åŒ–äº†é…ç½®å’Œç®¡ç†æµç¨‹ã€‚
summary.en: Aether is a self-hosted AI API gateway that supports unified access and management of various AI services, including Claude, OpenAI, and Gemini. Its core features include multi-tenant management, intelligent load balancing, and health monitoring, aimed at providing an efficient and flexible AI service infrastructure for teams and individuals. It supports Docker deployment, simplifying configuration and management processes.

metadata.name: aipyapp
metadata.description: AI-Powered Python & Python-Powered AI (Python-Use)

summary.zh: Python-Use æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ä»»åŠ¡é©±åŠ¨ã€ç»“æœå¯¼å‘çš„æ™ºèƒ½æ‰§è¡ŒèŒƒå¼ï¼Œç´§å¯†ç»“åˆå¤§å‹è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆLLMï¼‰ä¸ Python è§£é‡Šå™¨ï¼Œå½¢æˆå®Œæ•´çš„æ‰§è¡Œå¾ªç¯ã€‚å®ƒç®€åŒ–äº†ä¼ ç»Ÿ AI ä»£ç†æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ¶ˆé™¤äº†å¯¹å¤–éƒ¨å·¥å…·å’Œæ’ä»¶çš„ä¾èµ–ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ç”¨æˆ·åªéœ€æä¾›ä»»åŠ¡æè¿°ï¼Œæ¨¡å‹å³å¯è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå¹¶æ‰§è¡Œ Python ä»£ç ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä¸ç¯å¢ƒäº¤äº’ã€‚Python-Use é€šè¿‡è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œé‡æ–°è¿æ¥äº† AI ä¸ç°å®ä¸–ç•Œï¼Œå¼€å¯äº† AI Think Do æ—¶ä»£ã€‚
summary.en: Python-Use is a task-driven, result-oriented intelligent execution paradigm that tightly integrates large language models (LLMs) with a Python interpreter to form a complete execution loop. It simplifies traditional AI agent models by eliminating reliance on external tools and plugins, allowing users to provide only a task description while the model autonomously generates and executes Python code, interacting directly with the environment. Python-Use reconnects AI with the real world, ushering in the AI Think Do era.

summary.en: pure-genealogy is a modern family genealogy management system built on Next.js 15 and Supabase, tailored for Chinese users. It offers powerful visualization features, including 2D and 3D graph displays, along with member profile management and rich text biography recording. The project's highlights include a deeply localized user experience and real-time data synchronization, making it suitable for family history documentation and genealogy research.

summary.en: Humanizer-zh is an AI writing de-tracing tool designed for Chinese users, aimed at removing traces of AI-generated content to make texts more natural and human-like. This tool is suitable for editing and reviewing AI-generated content, enhancing readability and authenticity, and helping users identify common AI writing patterns. With simple installation and usage methods, users can easily rewrite texts while ensuring information integrity and personalized expression.

summary.en: The Smart Media Downloader automatically searches and downloads images and video clips based on user descriptions, with auto-trimming capabilities. Users can obtain high-quality media through simple voice commands without complex API configurations, greatly facilitating content creation and media acquisition. The project supports both Chinese and English commands, catering to users needing quick access to multimedia resources.

summary.en: OpenClaw is a personal AI assistant that runs on your own devices, compatible with multiple operating systems and platforms. It interacts with users through popular communication channels like WhatsApp, Telegram, and Slack, and supports voice recognition and live canvas rendering. The assistant aims to deliver a fast, always-on local experience, ideal for users seeking a private assistant.

metadata.name: astron-rpa

summary.en: AstronRPA is an enterprise-grade Robotic Process Automation (RPA) desktop application that supports low-code/no-code development. Users can rapidly build workflows and automate desktop software and web pages through a visual designer. It is deeply integrated with the Astron Agent platform, enabling bi-directional calls for efficient collaboration between automation processes and intelligent agent systems, suitable for various business automation scenarios.

metadata.name: tgo

summary.en: TGO is an open-source AI customer service platform designed to help enterprises build AI agent teams. It integrates multi-channel access, agent orchestration, RAG knowledge base management, and human collaboration. Supporting various large language models, it provides real-time responses and smart retrieval, making it suitable for diverse business scenarios and enhancing customer service efficiency and accuracy.

summary.en: Agentation is an agent-agnostic visual feedback tool designed to help users precisely reference code by clicking on page elements, adding notes, and copying structured output. Its main applications include frontend development and user experience design, supporting various selection methods and animation pause features to ensure clear feedback expression. The tool is dependency-free, compatible with React 18+, enhancing interaction efficiency with AI coding agents.

summary.en: WXPush is a lightweight WeChat message push service built on Cloudflare Workers, offering a simple API for multi-user message delivery. Key features include being completely free, a daily limit of up to 100,000 pushes, native pop-up and sound alerts. Users can quickly deploy through straightforward configuration or Docker, making it ideal for individuals and small teams.

summary.en: The 'Dive into LLMs' series of programming tutorials aims to provide beginners with practical references related to large models, covering topics such as fine-tuning, prompt learning, and knowledge editing. Based on courses from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, the tutorials are completely free and suitable for students and researchers looking to quickly grasp large model technologies through hands-on practice. The project emphasizes its non-profit nature, promoting the learning and application of large models.

metadata.description: Ally-Health is an intelligent healthcare assistant that combines Claude AI technology with medical expertise. Through natural language interaction, it helps users record symptoms, manage medications, track medical records, and access professional multidisciplinary consultation analysisâ€”making health management smarter and more accessible

summary.zh: WellAllyå¥åº·åŠ©æ‰‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½åŒ»ç–—åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œç»“åˆäº†Claude AIæŠ€æœ¯ä¸åŒ»å­¦ä¸“ä¸šçŸ¥è¯†ã€‚é€šè¿‡è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€äº¤äº’ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥è®°å½•ç—‡çŠ¶ã€ç®¡ç†è¯ç‰©ã€è·Ÿè¸ªåŒ»ç–—è®°å½•ï¼Œå¹¶è·å–ä¸“ä¸šçš„å¤šå­¦ç§‘å’¨è¯¢åˆ†æï¼Œä½¿å¥åº·ç®¡ç†æ›´åŠ æ™ºèƒ½å’Œä¾¿æ·ã€‚è¯¥ç³»ç»Ÿæ”¯æŒæ— æ•°æ®åº“çš„æ–‡ä»¶å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œå…·å¤‡æ™ºèƒ½åŒ»ç–—æŠ¥å‘Šå›¾åƒè¯†åˆ«å’Œè¯ç‰©ç›¸äº’ä½œç”¨æ£€æµ‹ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¸ªäººå¥åº·ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ã€‚
summary.en: WellAlly Health Assistant is an intelligent healthcare assistant that integrates Claude AI technology with medical expertise. Through natural language interaction, users can record symptoms, manage medications, track medical records, and access professional multidisciplinary consultation analysis, making health management smarter and more accessible. The system supports file-based storage without a database and features intelligent medical report image recognition and drug interaction detection, suitable for personal health information management.

summary.en: Nigate is an open-source NTFS utility designed for Mac, supporting all models including Intel and Apple Silicon. It offers full read-write access, mounting, and management for NTFS drives. With a modern Electron interface, it provides intuitive device management, featuring real-time monitoring, auto-mounting, and status displays, ensuring user safety and convenience during operations.

summary.en: Antigravity-Proxy is a transparent proxy injector tailored for the Antigravity editor, enabling the use of SOCKS5/HTTP proxies on Windows without TUN mode. It addresses the issue of needing a global proxy when using Antigravity, allowing users to proxy only specific processes and avoiding interference with local development. This tool is user-friendly and ideal for developers looking to use Antigravity reliably in China.

metadata.name: opencode-antigravity-auth
metadata.description: Enable Opencode to authenticate against Antigravity (Google's IDE) via OAuth so you can use Antigravity rate limits and access models like gemini-3-pro and claude-opus-4-5-thinking with your Google credentials.

summary.zh: opencode-antigravity-auth æ’ä»¶ä½¿ Opencode èƒ½å¤Ÿé€šè¿‡ OAuth è®¤è¯è®¿é—® Google çš„ Antigravity IDEï¼Œç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨ Antigravity çš„é€Ÿç‡é™åˆ¶å’Œè®¿é—®é«˜çº§æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆå¦‚ gemini-3-pro å’Œ claude-opus-4-6-thinkingï¼‰ã€‚è¯¥æ’ä»¶æ”¯æŒå¤šè´¦æˆ·ç®¡ç†ã€åŒé…é¢ç³»ç»Ÿå’Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ¢å¤åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€‚åˆéœ€è¦é«˜æ•ˆåˆ©ç”¨ Google èµ„æºçš„å¼€å‘è€…ï¼Œä½†ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶éœ€æ³¨æ„å¯èƒ½è¿å Google æœåŠ¡æ¡æ¬¾çš„é£é™©ã€‚
summary.en: The opencode-antigravity-auth plugin enables Opencode to authenticate against Google's Antigravity IDE via OAuth, allowing users to leverage Antigravity's rate limits and access advanced models like gemini-3-pro and claude-opus-4-6-thinking. It supports multi-account management, a dual quota system, and auto-recovery features, making it ideal for developers looking to efficiently utilize Google resources, though users should be aware of potential violations of Google's Terms of Service.

summary.en: Unsloth-MLX is a tool designed for Mac users that leverages Apple's MLX framework for fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) locally. It enables users to quickly prototype on their Mac and seamlessly transition to the cloud without rewriting code. This project addresses the limitations of using Unsloth on Macs, offering the same API for rapid experimentation and iteration, making it ideal for developers looking to reduce cloud computing costs.

summary.en: DeepTutor is an AI-powered personalized learning assistant designed to enhance the learning experience through features like massive document knowledge Q&A, interactive learning visualization, and knowledge reinforcement. Built with modern technologies such as Python, FastAPI, React, and Next.js, it targets the education sector, particularly online and adaptive learning systems. Key highlights include knowledge generation, deep research, and idea generation, making it ideal for users seeking to improve learning efficiency.

metadata.name: MiroThinker
metadata.description: MiroThinker is an open source deep research agent optimized for research and prediction. It achieves a 80.8% Avg@8 score on the challenging GAIA benchmark.

summary.en: MiroThinker is an open-source deep research agent optimized for research and prediction, achieving an 80.8% Avg@8 score on the GAIA benchmark. The project includes the MiroFlow tool framework and MiroVerse dataset, supporting various file formats for upload. It aims to enhance research efficiency and accuracy, suitable for academic research, financial forecasting, and more.

metadata.name: eino
metadata.description: The ultimate LLM/AI application development framework in Go.

summary.zh: Einoæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºGolangçš„LLMåº”ç”¨å¼€å‘æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œå€Ÿé‰´äº†LangChainå’ŒGoogle ADKç­‰å¼€æºæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œéµå¾ªGoè¯­è¨€çš„çº¦å®šã€‚å®ƒæä¾›å¯é‡ç”¨çš„ç»„ä»¶ã€AIä»£ç†å¼€å‘å·¥å…·åŒ…ï¼ˆADKï¼‰ä»¥åŠå°†ç»„ä»¶è¿æ¥æˆå›¾å½¢å’Œå·¥ä½œæµçš„èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºæ„å»ºå¤æ‚çš„AIåº”ç”¨ã€‚Einoæ”¯æŒå¤šä»£ç†åè°ƒã€ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç®¡ç†å’Œäººæœºäº¤äº’ï¼Œé€‚åˆå¼€å‘æ™ºèƒ½èŠå¤©æœºå™¨äººå’Œæ•°æ®åˆ†æå·¥å…·ã€‚
summary.en: Eino is a LLM application development framework in Golang, inspired by LangChain and Google ADK, adhering to Go conventions. It offers reusable components, an AI Agent Development Kit (ADK), and the ability to connect components into graphs and workflows, making it suitable for building complex AI applications. Eino supports multi-agent coordination, context management, and human-in-the-loop interactions, ideal for developing intelligent chatbots and data analysis tools.

summary.en: Claude Scientific Skills is a comprehensive collection of over 148 ready-to-use skills for science and research, applicable across biology, chemistry, medicine, and more. Supporting the open Agent Skills standard, it works with various AI agents like Cursor, Claude Code, and Codex, enabling users to execute complex scientific workflows and enhance research and analysis efficiency.

summary.en: AntAngelMed is an open-source medical language model jointly developed by the Health Information Center of Zhejiang Province, Ant Healthcare, and Zhejiang Anzhen'er Medical AI Technology Co., Ltd. It showcases world-leading medical capabilities, outperforming all open-source and many proprietary models on OpenAI's HealthBench and the authoritative MedAIBench. With a rigorous three-stage training process and efficient inference technology, it is well-suited for medical Q&A and diagnostic reasoning.

summary.en: Arboris-Novel is an AI writing assistant designed for creators to overcome creative blocks. It aids users in managing characters, locations, and storylines, providing inspiration and draft generation, while supporting multi-version comparison to enhance writing efficiency. This tool is suitable not only for novel writing but also for the conception and drafting of other literary works.

summary.en: The fqnovel-unidbg project utilizes unidbg technology to simulate the execution of Android SO libraries, primarily for calling fqnovel's APIs and performing signatures. It implements features such as book search, book information retrieval, directory access, and batch chapter content fetching, making it suitable for developers for further development and API expansion. The encryption and decryption algorithms reference other open-source projects, and the code is partially generated by GitHub Copilot, leaving room for optimization.

summary.en: PocketPal AI is a pocket-sized AI assistant app that runs small language models directly on iOS and Android devices without the need for an internet connection, ensuring user privacy. Key features include offline AI assistance, model flexibility, personalized assistant creation, and Hugging Face integration, making it ideal for users needing language model support anytime, anywhere.

metadata.name: MAI-UI
metadata.description: MAI-UI: Real-World Centric Foundation GUI Agents ranging from 2B to 235B

summary.zh: MAI-UI æ˜¯ä¸€ç³»åˆ—ä»¥ç”¨æˆ·ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒçš„ GUI ä»£ç†åŸºç¡€æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ¶µç›–ä» 2B åˆ° 235B çš„å¤šç§è§„æ¨¡ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒæŠ€æœ¯åŒ…æ‹¬å¢å¼ºçš„ä»£ç†ç”¨æˆ·äº¤äº’ã€è®¾å¤‡ä¸äº‘çš„åä½œç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä»¥åŠåŠ¨æ€å¼ºåŒ–å­¦ä¹ æ‰©å±•ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé«˜è¾¾ 512 ä¸ªå¹¶è¡Œç¯å¢ƒå’Œ 50 çš„ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡é•¿åº¦ã€‚MAI-UI åœ¨ GUI å®šä½å’Œå¯¼èˆªä»»åŠ¡ä¸Šå–å¾—äº†æ–°çš„åŸºå‡† SOTA ç»“æœï¼Œå±•ç¤ºäº†å…¶å“è¶Šçš„æ€§èƒ½å’Œå¹¿æ³›çš„åº”ç”¨æ½œåŠ›ã€‚
summary.en: MAI-UI is a family of user-centric GUI agent foundation models ranging from 2B to 235B in size. Key technologies include enhanced agent-user interaction, a device-cloud collaboration system, and dynamic reinforcement learning scaling, supporting up to 512 parallel environments and a context length of 50. MAI-UI sets new benchmark SOTA results in GUI grounding and navigation tasks, showcasing its exceptional performance and broad application potential.

metadata.name: sure
metadata.description: The personal finance app for everyone. NOT affiliated with or endorsed by Maybe Finance Inc.

summary.en: Sure is a personal finance app designed for everyone, enabling users to manage their finances independently. This project is a community fork of Maybe Finance, allowing self-hosting and offering comprehensive financial management features, including connections with professional advisors. Despite facing business challenges, the app aims to keep the codebase alive through open-source contributions and community involvement.

summary.en: Resume.polish() is a resume enhancement tool designed for programmers, transforming plain descriptions into professional resume language. Built with React, TypeScript, and Supabase, it is easy to use and integrate, ideal for job seekers looking to improve their resumes.

summary.en: WeChatAuto.SDK is an AI-oriented automation SDK for the WeChat PC client, developed on .NET. It supports various functionalities such as message sending, group management, and Moments operations, providing intuitive APIs for easy AI integration. The SDK is compatible with multiple Windows environments, supports multi-instance management, and event listening, making it suitable for developers and enterprises seeking efficient automation.

summary.en: This resume builder is a feature-rich tool that supports flexible customization, enabling users to quickly create, edit, and export professional resumes. summary.en: Sub2API is an open-source AI API gateway platform designed to efficiently manage and distribute subscription quotas from multiple AI products. It supports multi-account management, precise billing, and smart scheduling, allowing users to access upstream AI services via platform-generated API keys. summary.en: Guidance is an efficient programming paradigm for steering large language models. It offers flexible output structure control, reducing latency and costs compared to conventional prompting or fine-tuning. Users can constrain generation with regex and context-free grammars while seamlessly interleaving control and generation, making it suitable for various language models and enhancing the developer experience.

metadata.name: Fabric

summary.en: Fabric is an open-source framework designed to augment human capabilities using AI. It offers a modular system that allows users to organize and utilize crowdsourced AI prompts based on real-world tasks, simplifying the integration of AI functionalities. Suitable for various tools, Fabric enables users to create, collect, and manage essential AI solutions in one place, enhancing productivity.

summary.en: PDF Craft is an efficient tool focused on converting scanned book PDFs into various formats like Markdown and EPUB. Based on DeepSeek OCR technology, it accurately recognizes complex content such as tables and formulas, completing the conversion locally to ensure content integrity and readability. Its ability to automatically identify document structure makes the conversion process fast and efficient, suitable for handling academic and technical documents.

summary.en: Agentic RAG for Dummies is a modular Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system built with LangGraph, designed for quick learning and development of intelligent agents. The project features hierarchical indexing, conversation memory, and query clarification, supporting flexible component swapping, making it suitable for both beginners and developers. With an interactive notebook and modular architecture, users can easily grasp core concepts and rapidly implement custom applications.

summary.en: This is a Python-based Telegram bot designed to automate the student and teacher identity verification process on the SheerID platform. The tool simplifies the verification steps by automatically generating identity information and creating verification documents, supporting various services including Spotify and YouTube Premium. Core features include secure MySQL database management, concurrent request control, and a points system, making it suitable for users needing quick identity verification.

summary.en: MindWord is a writing tool based on mind mapping, designed to tackle the challenges of structured writing. With a visual multi-level mind map and bidirectional synchronization with Markdown, users can easily create, edit, and export documents. It supports AI-assisted node generation, making it suitable for writers, product managers, and others seeking an efficient document structuring experience.

The interface supports HTTP calls and is suitable for various WeChat versions. The project offers both a community edition and a professional edition, with the latter providing enhanced functionality and stability for long-running applications.

summary.en: Models.dev is an open-source database of AI model specifications, pricing, and capabilities. This project aims to fill the gap of a unified database for available AI models, supporting community contributions for easy model discovery and comparison. Users can access data through an API, facilitating transparency and accessibility in AI technology.

summary.en: StoryGen Atelier is an AI-assisted storyboard and video generation tool that utilizes the Gemini model for creating storyboard text and frames, Vertex AI Veo for generating transition clips, and ffmpeg for stitching the final video. It supports custom styles and shot counts, with built-in log and gallery management, making it ideal for creative professionals and video producers.

summary.en: Cognee is an open-source knowledge engine designed to build persistent and dynamic memory for AI agents. By combining vector search, graph databases, and self-improvement techniques, it transforms raw data into searchable and interconnected knowledge. This tool is ideal for applications requiring intelligent memory, such as personalized assistants and smart decision-making systems, achieving powerful functionality in just six lines of code.

summary.en: L2do-export is a Tampermonkey userscript designed to export complete forum posts and replies from linux.do in JSON or HTML format. It preserves post formatting, images, and links, with an option for image embedding to create self-contained files. Users can easily access post metadata, manage quoted relationships, and automatically deduplicate tags, making it ideal for users looking to organize and archive forum content.

summary.en: LinuxDo Scripts is a powerful browser extension designed to enhance the user experience of the LinuxDo forum. It integrates various practical features, including interface optimization and AI assistance, enabling users to browse and interact more efficiently. The extension is available on both Chrome and Firefox stores, inviting users to suggest new features for continuous updates to meet community needs.

Users can experiment in their browser and observe in real-time how internal components collaborate to predict the next tokens, making it suitable for educational and research purposes to enhance understanding of deep learning models.

summary.en: The book 'Foundations of LLMs' systematically explains the fundamentals of large language models, covering six major themes including traditional language models, model architecture evolution, and prompt engineering. It uses engaging animal backgrounds to simplify complex technologies and includes a paper list to track cutting-edge developments. The author team commits to regular updates, aiming to create a rigorous yet accessible textbook suitable for various applications like research and projects.

summary.en: PageIndex is a vectorless, reasoning-based document indexing system designed to enhance retrieval accuracy for long documents. By constructing a hierarchical tree index, it simulates how human experts extract knowledge, enabling context-aware retrieval. This system is particularly suited for scenarios requiring domain expertise and multi-step reasoning, addressing the limitations of traditional vector databases in semantic similarity.

summary.en: MobiAgent is a powerful and customizable mobile agent system that includes the MobiMind model family, the AgentRR acceleration framework, and the MobiFlow benchmark. It supports pure on-device inference on smartphones and simplifies multi-model configuration through a unified GUI agent runner. This system is ideal for mobile applications requiring intelligent and automated operations, featuring advanced capabilities like multi-task execution and user profile memory.

summary.en: ShizhenGPT is the first multimodal large language model designed for Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM), excelling in TCM knowledge and capable of understanding images, sounds, smells, and pulses. This project open-sources the largest TCM dataset, including pre-training and instruction fine-tuning datasets, aimed at enhancing model performance in TCM-related tasks, applicable in healthcare and education.

summary.en: YPrompt is a dialogue-based AI tool that automatically generates professional prompts by mining user needs. It supports optimization and comparison of system and user prompts, as well as version management. The practice arena offers real-time rendering, enabling users to generate and modify images through multi-turn dialogues, along with reverse prompt generation and optimization, making it ideal for designers and content creators.

summary.en: The Claude Code Multi-Agent Workflow System leverages AI for development automation with multi-backend execution (Codex, Claude, Gemini, OpenCode). It offers modular features including feature development, intelligent routing, and a lightweight requirements-to-code pipeline, suitable for rapid prototyping, enterprise projects, and bug fixing. Its core architecture enhances development efficiency and flexibility through agent collaboration.

summary.en: UndyDraw is a modern frontend application built with React, designed for interaction with Google's Gemini 3 Pro model. It offers a smooth chat interface supporting multimodal inputs, including text and image uploads, enhancing user experience. New features like drag-and-drop uploads, image history, and API balance management make it more convenient for users engaging with AI. The application also boasts high configurability and a modern UI/UX, suitable for scenarios requiring interaction with AI models.

summary.en: Visual Studio Code is an open-source code editor that combines simplicity with the core needs of developers in the edit-build-debug cycle. Monthly updates with new features and fixes make it popular among developers, available for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

Users can batch-generate videos using templates, replace materials in real-time, and preview results, supporting emotional voiceovers and creative freedom, making it ideal for short video production and content creators.

It is ideal for scenarios requiring smart code understanding and tool integration, especially for users utilizing Claude models.

summary.en: The AI Medical Consultation Panel is a front-end system developed with Vue 3 and Pinia, simulating multi-doctor collaborative diagnosis. By integrating multiple large language models, users can add different AI doctors for consultations, engage in real-time discussions, and intelligently evaluate diagnoses. The system requires no backend server, storing all data locally in the browser, making it suitable for AI applications in the medical field.

metadata.name: WriteHERE
metadata.description: An Open-Source AI Writing Project.

summary.en: WriteHERE is an open-source framework that revolutionizes long-form writing through human-like adaptive planning. Unlike traditional AI writing tools, WriteHERE dynamically decomposes writing tasks and integrates recursive planning, heterogeneous integration, and real-time adaptation, significantly enhancing fiction writing and technical report generation. The project emphasizes open-source principles, community contributions, and aims to advance research and education.

summary.en: AI Partner Chat is a personalized conversation system based on Claude Skills, integrating user personas and smart notes to provide context-aware dialogue experiences. It remembers user backgrounds and preferences, generating personalized responses suitable for scenarios requiring continuous interaction and tailored communication. The dual persona system and intelligent note retrieval features make conversations more natural and coherent.

summary.en: phi3-Chinese is a repository focused on the Chinese post-training models of Phi3, dedicated to collecting and sharing various training variants to enhance its applicability on lightweight devices like smartphones. The project provides multiple model download links and includes tutorials on training and deployment, aiming to help users better utilize Phi3 technology. Although there are issues with a small vocabulary and performance not meeting expectations, its lightweight characteristics still offer value in specific scenarios.

summary.en: Skid Homework is an ergonomically designed AI-powered homework assistant aimed at enhancing learning efficiency. Users can upload files, take photos, and submit them to AI for parsing through a browser, supporting various output formats and customizable answer styles. The platform emphasizes no telemetry, open-source, and ad-free experience, making it suitable for students and self-learners, providing a convenient operation and efficient homework solutions.

summary.en: MobiLlama is a small language model optimized for edge devices, aimed at achieving efficient and accurate natural language processing. With a design of 0.5 billion parameters, it emphasizes performance enhancement in resource-constrained environments, suitable for applications requiring low memory usage and energy efficiency. By employing a parameter sharing strategy, MobiLlama significantly reduces pre-training and deployment costs while maintaining accuracy, advancing the development of small language models.

Its powerful and comprehensive features include GenAI workflows, RAG, agents, unified model management, evaluation, SFT, dataset management, and enterprise-level system management. It is widely used by leading organizations and Fortune 500 companies, aiming to promote the widespread implementation of intelligent applications.

summary.en: The 'Hello-Agents' project is a comprehensive tutorial designed to help learners understand the core principles and applications of intelligent agents. It combines theory and practice, covering the definition, evolution, and construction methods of agents, with a focus on AI-native agents. Through hands-on practice, readers will master the design and implementation of agent systems, transitioning from users to builders, making it ideal for those looking to advance in the field of intelligent agents.

It features high extensibility and easy deployment, supporting a decoupled front-end and back-end development. With comprehensive permission control, dynamic menus, data dictionaries, and a file management system, it enables developers to rapidly build efficient management systems, ideal for quick development and flexible configuration in enterprise applications.

Its clear project structure and rich features (such as JWT authentication, middleware, caching, event handling, etc.) make backend development simple and efficient. The frontend uses Vue3 and Element-Plus, supports multilingual capabilities, and is easy to extend, making it suitable for rapid development of modern web applications.

summary.en: The MiniMind project enables users to train a small language model from scratch with minimal cost and time, requiring only $3 and 2 hours to build a 26M-parameter GPT. It offers complete training code, including dataset cleaning, pre-training, and fine-tuning, with all core algorithms implemented in native PyTorch. MiniMind serves as both a practical tool and an introductory tutorial for understanding large language models, fostering progress in the AI community.

summary.en: Pipecat is an open-source Python framework designed for building real-time voice and multimodal conversational agents. It seamlessly integrates audio, video, and various AI services, suitable for applications like voice assistants, AI companions, and interactive storytelling. Its modular components and low-latency features enable developers to quickly create complex dialogue systems, focusing on the uniqueness of their agents.

The A2A protocol facilitates efficient communication between different agents, suitable for building intelligent agent systems. Key highlights include various tools and SDKs related to A2A, enabling developers to quickly get started and integrate.

summary.zh: LazyCraft æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº LazyLLM çš„ AI Agent åº”ç”¨å¼€å‘ä¸ç®¡ç†å¹³å°ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨å¸®åŠ©å¼€å‘è€…ä»¥ä½é—¨æ§›ã€ä½æˆæœ¬å¿«é€Ÿæ„å»ºå’Œå‘å¸ƒå¤šæ ·åŒ–çš„ AI åº”ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚æ•°æ®æ´å¯Ÿå¸ˆå’Œä»£ç ç†è§£åŠ©æ‰‹ã€‚è¯¥å¹³å°æ”¯æŒå…¨æµç¨‹é—­ç¯ï¼Œæä¾›å¯è§†åŒ–ç»„ä»¶ç”»å¸ƒã€æ¨¡å‹æœåŠ¡ã€èµ„æºç®¡ç†åŠå¤šç§Ÿæˆ·æ”¯æŒï¼Œçµæ´»çš„æ¶æ„ä½¿å¾—å›¢é˜Ÿèƒ½å¤Ÿå¿«é€ŸéªŒè¯æƒ³æ³•å¹¶åŠ é€Ÿ AI æŠ€æœ¯çš„è½åœ°ä¸è¿­ä»£ã€‚
summary.en: LazyCraft is an AI Agent application development and management platform built on LazyLLM, designed to help developers quickly create and publish diverse AI applications, such as data insight tools and code understanding assistants, with low barriers and costs. The platform supports a complete workflow, offering a visual component canvas, model services, resource management, and multi-tenant support, enabling teams to rapidly validate ideas and accelerate the deployment and iteration of AI technologies.

summary.en: Astron Agent is an enterprise-grade, commercial-friendly workflow development platform that integrates AI workflow orchestration, model management, RPA automation, and team collaboration features. It supports high-availability deployment, enabling organizations to rapidly build scalable intelligent agent applications and establish a foundation for future AI. Key technologies include stable cross-system integration and flexible large model support, suitable for various industry scenarios.

summary.en: MuMuAINovel is an AI-powered intelligent novel creation assistant designed to help users effortlessly craft engaging stories. summary.zh: SongBloom æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ›æ–°çš„å…¨é•¿æ­Œæ›²ç”Ÿæˆæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨äº¤é”™è‡ªå›å½’è‰å›¾å’Œæ‰©æ•£ç²¾ç‚¼çš„èŒƒå¼ã€‚å®ƒç»“åˆäº†æ‰©æ•£æ¨¡å‹çš„é«˜ä¿çœŸåº¦ä¸è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹çš„å¯æ‰©å±•æ€§ï¼Œé€šè¿‡é€æ­¥æ‰©å±•éŸ³ä¹è‰å›¾å¹¶ä»ç²—åˆ°ç»†è¿›è¡Œç»†èŠ‚ç²¾ç‚¼ï¼Œæå‡ç”Ÿæˆè´¨é‡ã€‚å®éªŒç»“æœæ˜¾ç¤ºï¼ŒSongBloom åœ¨ä¸»è§‚å’Œå®¢è§‚æŒ‡æ ‡ä¸Šå‡ä¼˜äºç°æœ‰æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸”è¡¨ç°ä¸é¢†å…ˆçš„å•†ä¸šéŸ³ä¹ç”Ÿæˆå¹³å°ç›¸å½“ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºéŸ³ä¹åˆ›ä½œã€å¨±ä¹å’ŒAIè‰ºæœ¯ç­‰é¢†åŸŸã€‚
summary.en: SongBloom is an innovative framework for full-length song generation that employs an interleaved paradigm of autoregressive sketching and diffusion refinement. It combines the high fidelity of diffusion models with the scalability of language models, gradually extending a musical sketch and refining details from coarse to fine. Experimental results show that SongBloom outperforms existing methods in both subjective and objective metrics, achieving performance comparable to leading commercial music generation platforms, making it suitable for music creation, entertainment, and AI art.

It features unified authentication, a visual management panel, and intelligent scheduling to ensure high availability and stability. The project has been renamed to CCX, offering failover, multi-API key management, and protocol conversion, making it suitable for scenarios requiring integration of multiple AI services.

It is ideal for developers needing to monitor API usage and project status, simplifying the retrieval and presentation of status information.

metadata.name: parlant

summary.en: Parlant is an LLM agent framework designed for control, addressing the pain points AI developers face in production environments. By ensuring agents adhere to clear behavioral guidelines, Parlant simplifies the creation of customer-facing agents that meet business requirements. Its rapid deployment and user-friendliness make it suitable for various real-world applications.

summary.en: xpander.ai is a robust runtime and control plane designed for rapidly building, running, and shipping reliable AI agents. It supports any framework, allowing users to deploy agents in the cloud or their own VPC/Kubernetes with stateful databases, CI/CD, and logging capabilities. The platform features a chat interface, a workbench, and a connector hub, making it easy to manage and schedule tasks, ideal for scenarios requiring quick development and deployment of AI solutions.

summary.en: NOFX is an open-source AI Trading OS that provides multi-AI and multi-exchange trading infrastructure. Key features include support for various AI models, a visual strategy builder, real-time dashboards, and competitive debates among AI models, catering to cryptocurrency, US stocks, forex, and precious metals markets. The platform aims to deliver a flexible and efficient trading experience, suitable for learning and research purposes.

summary.en: DeepSeek-OCR Studio is a multimodal document parsing tool based on DeepSeek-OCR, featuring a React frontend and FastAPI backend. It efficiently processes PDF documents and images, offering key functionalities such as multi-format document parsing, intelligent OCR recognition, layout analysis, multi-language text recognition, and table and chart parsing, making it ideal for high-precision text extraction and data visualization applications.

summary.en: The WeChat Multi-Instance Manager offers macOS users an interactive solution to easily create and manage multiple WeChat instances. summary.en: Instructional Animation is an AI-driven educational animation generator that automatically creates visually appealing HTML5 animation pages based on user-inputted knowledge topics, with support for exporting to MP4 and GIF formats. Suitable for education, knowledge sharing, and online courses, it features bilingual support, real-time streaming output, and containerized deployment, significantly enhancing the visualization and interactivity of educational content.

metadata.name: enterprise-deep-research

summary.en: Enterprise Deep Research (EDR) is a multi-agent system that integrates a Master Planning Agent for adaptive query decomposition and four specialized search agents (General, Academic, GitHub, LinkedIn). It features an extensible tool ecosystem supporting NL2SQL, file analysis, and enterprise workflows, along with a Visualization Agent for data-driven insights and a reflection mechanism to detect knowledge gaps, enabling automated report generation and real-time streaming for enterprise deep data analysis.

It is suitable for RFID research and security testing, supports various applications, and comes with strong community backing and extensive documentation.

summary.en: BuildingAI is an enterprise-grade open-source intelligent agent platform designed for AI developers and businesses to build native AI applications without coding. Users can easily create applications like intelligent agents and AI customer service through a visual configuration interface. The platform supports various native features, including knowledge bases, model management, and membership management, making it suitable for diverse enterprises and innovative organizations.

metadata.name: nof1-tracker

summary.en: Nof1-tracker is a command-line tool designed for tracking trading signals from nof1.ai AI Agents and automatically executing Binance futures trades. It supports up to seven AI quantitative trading agents, featuring real-time monitoring, intelligent following, and profit target settings, making it suitable for users looking to leverage AI for automated trading. The tool also offers deployment services, simplifying the environment setup and operation process.

summary.en: The AI Smart Glasses for the Blind is a navigation and assistance framework designed for visually impaired individuals. It integrates features like blind path navigation, street crossing assistance, object recognition, and real-time voice interaction. Based on ESP32, it utilizes YOLO models for real-time environmental perception, providing voice guidance and obstacle avoidance to enhance the safety and convenience of visually impaired users.

summary.en: LattifAI is an advanced forced alignment and subtitle generation tool powered by the Lattice-1 model, supporting multiple languages and formats. Its core features include word-level audio-text synchronization, multi-model transcription, speaker diarization, and streaming mode, efficiently handling audio files up to 20 hours long. This project is ideal for applications requiring precise audio processing and subtitle generation, such as film production and educational training.

summary.en: WxMQTT is a WeChat mini-program project based on the MQTT protocol, designed for remote monitoring and control of sensors such as temperature, humidity, soil, and water quality. The project introduces a car control module, allowing users to synchronize data via WeChat ID and control the car's lights, direction, and motor status in real-time, enhancing user interaction. This project is suitable for IoT applications, particularly in smart home and remote control scenarios.

summary.en: SimpleAccount is a local accounting application focused on privacy and security, developed using the uni-app framework with all data stored locally to ensure user privacy. Its core features include intelligent bookkeeping, voice recognition, and visual data statistics, making it suitable for users seeking simplicity and efficiency. The app supports multi-platform operation, offering rich category management and data import/export functionalities to meet diverse financial management needs.

summary.en: claude-codex-api is an efficient configuration management tool designed to simplify the switching and management of Claude Code and Codex APIs. Users can easily switch between different API configurations, environment variables, and test API latency and validity with a single command. The tool supports various configuration file formats (like JSON, YAML) and features automatic optimal routing switching and internationalization support, making it suitable for developers to quickly switch and test APIs across multiple environments. Its simple command-line interface enhances usability.

summary.en: XunLong is an intelligent multi-modal content generation system that leverages Large Language Models to automatically produce high-quality research reports, novels, and presentations. Utilizing a multi-agent collaborative architecture orchestrated by LangGraph, it supports document input, intelligent search, and professional export in various formats, along with style customization and iterative refinement, making it suitable for academic, business, and creative writing.

summary.en: Awesome Vibe Coding is a curated list of references aimed at enhancing the coding experience through collaboration with AI. The project covers various domains including browser tools, IDEs, plugins, and mobile apps, assisting developers in realizing their ideas more effortlessly. Its core highlight is the concept of 'vibe coding,' encouraging developers to let go of traditional coding constraints and focus on creativity and rapid iteration.

summary.en: NeuTTS is an open-source, on-device Text-to-Speech (TTS) model developed by Neuphonic, supporting multiple languages including English, French, German, and Spanish. Its key highlights include ultra-realistic voice generation, instant voice cloning, and optimization for mobile devices, making it suitable for embedded voice assistants, toys, and compliance-safe applications. With a lightweight LLM architecture, NeuTTS offers efficient real-time performance and security, advancing the localization of voice AI.

summary.en: EasyOffer is an open-source project designed for beginners of large language models (LLM) and job seekers preparing for autumn recruitment. It provides records of interview experiences from major companies, handwritten code implementations, and common problem-solving questions, aiming to help users deeply understand LLM principles and efficiently prepare for internships. The project currently covers DeepSeek model implementations, model generation methods, and reinforcement learning modules, with plans to expand to LLaMA series and other popular models.

summary.en: LuoGen-agent is a commercial-grade video automation tool that enables one-click generation of high-quality digital avatar videos. Its core features include smart copywriting, voice cloning, digital human generation, and full video production, supporting multi-platform publishing. By integrating advanced technologies like Whisper, CosyVoice, and HeyGem, it simplifies the video creation process, making it ideal for content creators and marketers.

summary.en: This project is a watermark removal service based on Spring Boot 3, supporting various short video and image collection platforms, including Douyin, Instagram, Xiaohongshu, etc. Users can easily remove watermarks from videos and images by configuring account information and proxy settings, making it suitable for content creators and social media users, enhancing the convenience and aesthetics of content sharing.

summary.en: MCP Router is a unified desktop application designed to simplify the management of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. It supports connections to both local and remote servers, features cross-platform compatibility, and ensures all data is stored locally for enhanced privacy. Users can easily manage multiple servers, import/export configurations, and seamlessly integrate with popular AI tools, making it ideal for developers and tech enthusiasts.

summary.en: PAL MCP is a provider abstraction layer tool designed to integrate multiple AI models, such as Claude Code, Gemini, and Codex CLI, into a single workflow. With CLI-to-CLI bridging, users can seamlessly invoke different AI models within the same environment for code reviews, problem-solving, and collaborative development. The tool supports conversation continuity, allowing users to discuss and collaborate across multiple models, enhancing development efficiency and code quality.

summary.en: The Xiao Zhi AI robot music playback firmware is an open-source project based on ESP32, designed to provide users with intelligent music playback capabilities. The firmware supports various character customization and personalization options, featuring smart music control, offline voice wake-up, and voiceprint recognition. It is suitable for smart home and voice interaction scenarios. Through the MCP protocol, users can achieve multi-end control of devices, enhancing the robot's interactivity and practicality.

summary.en: Jules Awesome List is a curated collection of prompts for Jules, an async coding agent from Google Labs. It covers various aspects like everyday development tasks, debugging, documentation, testing, and package management. The project aims to enhance developer efficiency by providing quick solutions to common issues, suitable for various programming languages and development environments, especially in AI-assisted scenarios.

summary.en: The XiaoZhi AI Custom Assets Single Page Application enables users to generate and export assets.bin files online, allowing customization of wake words, fonts, emojis, and chat backgrounds. Users complete theme design in three steps by selecting chip models and screen configurations. The project utilizes a browser-based generation approach, eliminating the need for backend support, with technical implementations including wake word model packaging and resource processing, suitable for personalized customization of smart voice devices.

summary.en: Claude Code Proxy is a proxy server designed to enable Claude Code to interact with OpenAI-compatible API providers. It supports full Claude API compatibility, converting requests into OpenAI API calls, and accommodates various LLM providers like OpenAI and Azure OpenAI. The project features smart model mapping, real-time streaming responses, and custom header injection, making it ideal for developers needing to integrate multiple language models.

metadata.name: mcp-manager
metadata.description: This is a visual client tool used to manage MCP (Model Context Protocol). With this tool, you can easily manage and operate the MCP environment without manually performing complex command-line operations.

summary.zh: MCP Manager æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ç”¨äºç®¡ç†æ¨¡å‹ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡åè®®ï¼ˆMCPï¼‰çš„å¯è§†åŒ–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å·¥å…·ã€‚è¯¥å·¥å…·ç®€åŒ–äº† MCP ç¯å¢ƒçš„ç®¡ç†ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·æ— éœ€æ‰‹åŠ¨æ‰§è¡Œå¤æ‚çš„å‘½ä»¤è¡Œæ“ä½œå³å¯è½»æ¾è¿›è¡Œç¯å¢ƒå®‰è£…ã€å¯åŠ¨å’Œåœæ­¢ç®¡ç†ã€‚å…¶ç›´è§‚çš„å›¾å½¢ç•Œé¢å’Œè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–é…ç½®åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€‚åˆä¸ªäººå­¦ä¹ å’Œéå•†ä¸šç”¨é€”ã€‚
summary.en: MCP Manager is a visual client tool for managing the Model Context Protocol (MCP). This tool simplifies the management of the MCP environment, allowing users to easily install, start, and stop without complex command-line operations. Its intuitive graphical interface and automated configuration make it suitable for personal learning and non-commercial use.

summary.en: TradingAgents-CN is a Chinese financial trading framework based on multi-agent systems and large language models, designed specifically for Chinese users. The platform offers comprehensive tools for stock analysis learning, supporting compliant research and strategy experimentation for A-shares, Hong Kong stocks, and US stocks. Key technologies include FastAPI backend, Vue 3 frontend, and Docker containerization, featuring intelligent model selection and multi-data source synchronization, aiming to promote the adoption of AI financial technology in the Chinese community.

summary.en: AI_NovelGenerator is an automated novel generation tool based on large language models, capable of efficiently producing multi-chapter long novels. Its core features include intelligent chapter generation, character development tracking, semantic search engine, and automatic proofreading mechanism, ensuring logical coherence and unified settings in storytelling. It is suitable for writers and screenwriters, aiding in inspiration and content creation.
