summary.en: This project collects and preserves Windows WeChat versions 3.x and earlier, utilizing GitHub Actions to automatically download the latest installation packages and compute their hash values, ensuring version integrity and traceability. It serves users and developers needing specific legacy versions of WeChat, offering a convenient solution for accessing and managing historical versions.

metadata.name: LiveTalking
metadata.description: Real time interactive streaming digital human

summary.zh: LiveTalking æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å®æ—¶äº¤äº’æµå¼æ•°å­—äººè§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§æ•°å­—äººæ¨¡å‹å’Œå£°éŸ³å…‹éš†ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿå®ç°éŸ³è§†é¢‘åŒæ­¥å¯¹è¯ã€‚å…¶ä¸»è¦åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯åŒ…æ‹¬åœ¨çº¿æ•™è‚²ã€è™šæ‹Ÿå®¢æœå’Œå¨±ä¹äº’åŠ¨ç­‰ã€‚æŠ€æœ¯äº®ç‚¹åœ¨äºæ”¯æŒ WebRTC å’Œè™šæ‹Ÿæ‘„åƒå¤´è¾“å‡ºï¼Œå…·å¤‡å¤šå¹¶å‘å¤„ç†èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿä¸ºç”¨æˆ·æä¾›ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–çš„æ•°å­—äººå½¢è±¡ã€‚
summary.en: LiveTalking is a real-time interactive streaming digital human solution that supports various digital human models and voice cloning, enabling synchronized audio and video conversations. Its primary application scenarios include online education, virtual customer service, and entertainment interactions. Key features include support for WebRTC and virtual camera output, as well as multi-concurrent processing capabilities, allowing for personalized digital human avatars.

summary.zh: seed-tts-eval ä»“åº“æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºè¯„ä¼°é›¶æ ·æœ¬è¯­éŸ³ç”Ÿæˆèƒ½åŠ›çš„å®¢è§‚æµ‹è¯•é›†ï¼ŒåŒ…å«æ¥è‡ªå…¬å…±è¯­æ–™åº“çš„æ ·æœ¬ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨æµ‹é‡æ¨¡å‹åœ¨ä¸åŒå®¢è§‚æŒ‡æ ‡ä¸Šçš„è¡¨ç°ã€‚è¯¥æµ‹è¯•é›†ä½¿ç”¨äº† Common Voice å’Œ DiDiSpeech-2 æ•°æ®é›†çš„æ ·æœ¬ï¼Œå¹¶é‡‡ç”¨å­—é”™è¯¯ç‡ï¼ˆWERï¼‰å’Œè¯´è¯äººç›¸ä¼¼åº¦ï¼ˆSIMï¼‰ä½œä¸ºè¯„ä¼°æŒ‡æ ‡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä¸­è‹±æ–‡çš„è¯­éŸ³åˆæˆä¸è½¬æ¢ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚
summary.en: The seed-tts-eval repository offers an objective test set for evaluating the zero-shot speech generation capability, featuring samples from public corpora to measure model performance across various metrics. It utilizes samples from the Common Voice and DiDiSpeech-2 datasets, employing word error rate (WER) and speaker similarity (SIM) as evaluation metrics, supporting both English and Mandarin speech synthesis and conversion tasks.

metadata.name: ER-NeRF
metadata.description: [ICCV'23] Efficient Region-Aware Neural Radiance Fields for High-Fidelity Talking Portrait Synthesis

summary.zh: æœ¬é¡¹ç›®å®ç°äº†é«˜æ•ˆçš„åŒºåŸŸæ„ŸçŸ¥ç¥ç»è¾å°„åœºï¼ˆER-NeRFï¼‰ï¼Œç”¨äºé«˜ä¿çœŸåº¦çš„åŠ¨æ€äººåƒåˆæˆã€‚é€šè¿‡åŒºåŸŸæ„ŸçŸ¥æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œè¯¥æ–¹æ³•èƒ½å¤Ÿåœ¨ä¿æŒé«˜è´¨é‡çš„åŒæ—¶ï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—æé«˜åˆæˆæ•ˆç‡ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºè™šæ‹Ÿç°å®ã€åŠ¨ç”»åˆ¶ä½œå’Œç¤¾äº¤åª’ä½“ç­‰é¢†åŸŸã€‚å…¶æŠ€æœ¯äº®ç‚¹åœ¨äºå¯¹äººè„¸è§£æå’Œ3DMMæ¨¡å‹çš„æœ‰æ•ˆç»“åˆï¼Œç¡®ä¿äº†åˆæˆè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­çš„ç»†èŠ‚ä¿ç•™ä¸è‡ªç„¶è¡¨ç°ã€‚
summary.en: This project implements Efficient Region-Aware Neural Radiance Fields (ER-NeRF) for high-fidelity talking portrait synthesis. By leveraging region-aware techniques, it significantly enhances synthesis efficiency while maintaining high quality, making it suitable for applications in virtual reality, animation production, and social media. Key highlights include effective integration of face parsing and 3DMM models, ensuring detail retention and natural expression during synthesis.

metadata.name: Vach
metadata.description: Real time streaming talking head

summary.zh: Vach æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å®æ—¶æµå¼æ•°å­—äººæŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿå®ç°éŸ³è§†é¢‘åŒæ­¥å¯¹è¯ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºåœ¨çº¿æ•™è‚²ã€è™šæ‹Ÿå®¢æœç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½åŒ…æ‹¬æ–‡æœ¬å’Œè¯­éŸ³äº¤äº’ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ SyncTalk é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œå…·å¤‡å•†ç”¨æ½œåŠ›ã€‚é¡¹ç›®åŸºäº PyTorch å’Œ CUDAï¼Œæä¾›é¢„è®­ç»ƒæ¨¡å‹ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·å¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰è®­ç»ƒæ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿å¿«é€Ÿéƒ¨ç½²å’Œä½¿ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: Vach is a real-time streaming talking head technology that enables synchronized audio and video conversations, suitable for online education and virtual customer service. Its core features include text and voice interaction, support for the SyncTalk project, and commercial potential. The project is based on PyTorch and CUDA, providing pre-trained models and allowing users to customize their own training models for easy deployment and use.

metadata.name: RWKV-LM
metadata.description: RWKV (pronounced RwaKuv) is an RNN with great LLM performance, which can also be directly trained like a GPT transformer (parallelizable). We are at RWKV-7 "Goose". So it's combining the best of RNN and transformer - great performance, linear time, constant space (no kv-cache), fast training, infinite ctx_len, and free sentence embedding.

summary.zh: RWKVæ˜¯ä¸€ç§å…·æœ‰å‡ºè‰²å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹æ€§èƒ½çš„RNNï¼Œç»“åˆäº†RNNå’ŒTransformerçš„ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼Œå…·å¤‡çº¿æ€§æ—¶é—´å’Œå¸¸é‡ç©ºé—´çš„ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œé€‚åˆå¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹å’Œå¤šæ¨¡æ€åº”ç”¨ã€‚RWKV-7 'Goose'æ”¯æŒå¿«é€Ÿè®­ç»ƒå’Œæ— é™ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡é•¿åº¦ï¼Œä¸”æ— éœ€kv-cacheï¼Œæä¾›äº†é«˜æ•ˆçš„æ¨ç†èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚è¯¥é¡¹ç›®å®Œå…¨å…è´¹ï¼Œé€‚åˆå¼€å‘è€…å’Œç ”ç©¶è€…è¿›è¡Œæ¨¡å‹å‡çº§å’Œåº”ç”¨å¼€å‘ã€‚
summary.en: RWKV is an RNN with exceptional performance in large language models, combining the strengths of RNNs and Transformers with linear time and constant space characteristics, making it suitable for LLM and multimodal applications. RWKV-7 'Goose' supports fast training and infinite context length without kv-cache, offering efficient inference capabilities. The project is completely free, ideal for developers and researchers looking to upgrade models and develop applications.

summary.en: Ultralytics YOLO is an advanced object detection model built on foundational research in computer vision and AI, known for its speed, accuracy, and ease of use. The project supports various tasks, including object detection, tracking, instance segmentation, image classification, and pose estimation, making it suitable for diverse applications. Ultralytics continuously updates its models for performance and flexibility, offering comprehensive documentation and community support for quick onboarding and troubleshooting.

The project encourages community co-creation, allowing users to submit content and suggestions via GitHub, ensuring continuous updates and optimization of resources.

summary.en: dddd_trainer is an OCR training tool based on Pytorch, specifically designed for NVIDIA GPU users, supporting CNN and CRNN model training. It offers features like checkpoint recovery, automatic ONNX model export, and seamless integration with ddddocr and ocr_api_server, suitable for Windows and Linux environments. The project is set for an update, introducing visual training and new training strategies, greatly enhancing the convenience and flexibility of OCR model training.

summary.en: TTSlist is a voice library featuring 10,000 Chinese tones, designed to alleviate the hassle of selecting voices in chatTTS. Users can easily choose voices online and generate audio using simple numeric parameters. Developed by Kang Kang, this project aims to provide a rich selection of tones for AI voice synthesis, making it suitable for developers and enthusiasts.

summary.en: Fish Speech is an open-source text-to-speech (TTS) and voice cloning model designed to generate natural, realistic, and emotionally rich speech. It focuses on how humans actually speak, incorporating emotion, variation, and intent, avoiding robotic outputs. FishAudio-S1 is the first model in this series, offering significant improvements in quality and performance, suitable for applications requiring high-quality speech synthesis, such as virtual assistants, gaming, and education.

summary.en: Speech-AI-Forge is a project centered around TTS generation models, offering an API server and a Gradio-based WebUI. It supports various voice tones and styles for text-to-speech functionalities. Users can experience the project through local deployment, Docker, or Colab, making it suitable for high-quality speech synthesis applications like voice assistants, education, and entertainment. Key features include voice switching, custom voice uploads, and long text processing.

summary.en: MiGPT is an intelligent home assistant that integrates Xiao Ai speaker with ChatGPT, enhancing user experience through features like AI Q&A, role-playing, and streaming responses. It supports custom TTS and long-term memory, allowing devices to better understand user needs and creating a warm smart home environment. Ideal for users looking to upgrade their smart home to be more intelligent and interactive.

metadata.name: Easy-Voice-Toolkit

summary.en: Easy Voice Toolkit is a user-friendly audio toolkit focused on voice recognition, transcription, and conversion. Based on open-source voice projects, it offers various automated audio processing tools that users can selectively use or combine to gradually transform raw audio files into ideal speech models. It is intended for academic exchange and learning purposes, not for commercial use.

summary.en: Awesome-ChatTTS is an officially recommended resource collection project designed to provide users with comprehensive materials and FAQs related to ChatTTS. The project includes various feature enhancements and extensions, supporting timbre control, text processing, and emotional modulation, making it suitable for developers and users to quickly get started and delve into ChatTTS. With abundant community resources, users can better experience and apply text-to-speech technology.

metadata.name: awesome-instruction-dataset
metadata.description: A collection of open-source dataset to train instruction-following LLMs (ChatGPT,LLaMA,Alpaca)

summary.en: This repository aggregates various open-source datasets designed for training instruction-following language models (LLMs) like ChatGPT and LLaMA. It offers visual and text instruction tuning datasets, along with Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) datasets, facilitating researchers and developers in efficiently accessing and utilizing these resources to advance intelligent dialogue systems.

metadata.name: ChatTTS
metadata.description: A generative speech model for daily dialogue.

summary.zh: ChatTTS æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸“ä¸ºæ—¥å¸¸å¯¹è¯åœºæ™¯è®¾è®¡çš„ç”Ÿæˆæ€§è¯­éŸ³æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‹±è¯­å’Œä¸­æ–‡ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿå®ç°è‡ªç„¶æµç•…çš„è¯­éŸ³åˆæˆã€‚å…¶æŠ€æœ¯äº®ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬å¯¹è¯å¼ TTSã€å¤šè¯´è¯è€…æ”¯æŒã€ç»†ç²’åº¦çš„éŸµå¾‹æ§åˆ¶ï¼ˆå¦‚ç¬‘å£°å’Œåœé¡¿ï¼‰ä»¥åŠä¼˜äºå¤§å¤šæ•°å¼€æº TTS æ¨¡å‹çš„éŸµå¾‹è¡¨ç°ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å‹ç»è¿‡è¶…è¿‡ 10 ä¸‡å°æ—¶çš„éŸ³é¢‘æ•°æ®è®­ç»ƒï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå­¦æœ¯ç ”ç©¶å’Œå¼€å‘ã€‚
summary.en: ChatTTS is a generative speech model specifically designed for daily dialogue scenarios, supporting English and Chinese, enabling natural and expressive speech synthesis. Key highlights include conversational TTS, multi-speaker support, fine-grained prosodic control (like laughter and pauses), and superior prosody compared to most open-source TTS models. The model is trained on over 100,000 hours of audio data, intended for academic research and development.

summary.en: One API is a management and distribution system for LLM APIs, supporting various mainstream models such as OpenAI, Azure, and Google Gemini. It offers a unified API interface for key management and redistribution. The system is available as a single executable file and supports Docker deployment, making it easy for developers and enterprises to integrate multiple AI models.

summary.en: ChatLYT is an AI auto-reply bot for WeChat that operates without the web version. Utilizing image recognition, it supports the GPT-4 model and can handle text, images, and voice messages. With human-like response capabilities, it is ideal for personal users seeking efficient communication. The project is continuously updated to enhance code logic and user interface.

metadata.name: univer
metadata.description: Build AI-native spreadsheets. Univer is a full-stack framework for creating and editing spreadsheets on both web and server. With Univer Platform, Univer Spreadsheets is driven directly through natural language.

summary.zh: Univeræ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨æ ˆæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨æ„å»ºå’Œç¼–è¾‘AIåŸç”Ÿç”µå­è¡¨æ ¼ï¼Œæ”¯æŒåœ¨Webå’ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸Šè¿è¡Œã€‚å®ƒé€šè¿‡è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€é©±åŠ¨ç”µå­è¡¨æ ¼ï¼Œå…·å¤‡é«˜æ€§èƒ½ã€å¯æ‰©å±•æ€§å’Œæ˜“åµŒå…¥æ€§ï¼Œé€‚åˆå„ç§åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚Univeræä¾›ä¸°å¯Œçš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬å…¬å¼æ”¯æŒã€æ¡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ã€æ•°æ®éªŒè¯å’Œåä½œç¼–è¾‘ï¼Œä¸”å…·æœ‰å¼ºå¤§çš„æ’ä»¶æ¶æ„ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿å¼€å‘è€…æ ¹æ®éœ€æ±‚è¿›è¡Œå®šåˆ¶ã€‚
summary.en: Univer is a full-stack framework designed for building and editing AI-native spreadsheets, operating seamlessly on both web and server environments. It leverages natural language to drive spreadsheets, offering high performance, extensibility, and easy embedding for various applications. With features like formula support, conditional formatting, data validation, and collaborative editing, Univer also boasts a powerful plugin architecture for developers to customize according to their needs.

metadata.name: MusicGPT
metadata.description: Generate music based on natural language prompts using LLMs running locally

summary.en: MusicGPT is an application that generates music based on natural language prompts, allowing efficient local execution of the latest AI music generation models. Currently supporting Meta's MusicGen, it plans to expand to more models in the future. Users can interact through a simple command line or graphical interface to generate diverse music samples, suitable for music creation, game development, and more, without the need for heavy dependencies. The project aims to provide a convenient music generation experience.

metadata.name: CopilotKit
metadata.description: The Frontend for Agents & Generative UI. React + Angular

summary.en: CopilotKit is an efficient SDK designed for building full-stack agentic applications, generative UIs, and chat applications. It supports real-time shared state, dynamic UI component generation, and human-in-the-loop workflows, making it suitable for scenarios requiring intelligent agents and user interaction. The project has been adopted by several renowned companies, showcasing its core value in modern application development.

metadata.name: kalidokit

summary.zh: Kalidokit æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äº Mediapipe/Tensorflow.js çš„æ··åˆå½¢çŠ¶å’Œè¿åŠ¨å­¦è®¡ç®—å™¨ï¼Œä¸“æ³¨äºäººè„¸ã€çœ¼ç›ã€å§¿åŠ¿å’Œæ‰‹éƒ¨è·Ÿè¸ªã€‚å®ƒæ”¯æŒå¤šç§é¢„è®­ç»ƒæ¨¡å‹ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿè®¡ç®— 3D åœ°æ ‡çš„ç®€å•æ¬§æ‹‰æ—‹è½¬å’Œæ··åˆå½¢çŠ¶é¢éƒ¨å€¼ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äº Vtuber ç½‘é¡µåº”ç”¨ã€‚å°½ç®¡ Kalidokit ç›®å‰å·²è¢«å®˜æ–¹å¼ƒç”¨ï¼Œä½†å…¶æŠ€æœ¯ä»å°†ç›´æ¥é›†æˆåˆ° MediaPipe ä¸­ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºäº†å…¶åœ¨å®æ—¶åŠ¨ç”»å’Œè™šæ‹Ÿè§’è‰²åº”ç”¨ä¸­çš„æ ¸å¿ƒä»·å€¼ã€‚
summary.en: Kalidokit is a blendshape and kinematics calculator for Mediapipe/Tensorflow.js, focusing on face, eyes, pose, and hand tracking. It supports various pretrained models, calculating simple euler rotations and blendshape face values, making it suitable for Vtuber web applications. Although officially deprecated, its technology will be integrated directly into MediaPipe, showcasing its core value in real-time animation and virtual character applications.

summary.en: wukong-robot is a flexible and elegant Chinese voice dialogue robot/smart speaker project that supports multi-turn conversations and brain-computer interaction, aimed at helping Chinese Makers and Hackers quickly build personalized smart speakers. summary.en: StoryDiffusion is an innovative tool for image and video generation that employs consistent self-attention mechanisms to create coherent character images over long sequences. Additionally, the Motion Predictor feature enables long-range video generation by predicting motion in a compressed image semantic space, enhancing the quality and coherence of the generated videos.

It supports hot reloading for both frontend and backend, provides code encryption for performance and security, and defines coding and file hierarchy standards. This technology significantly enhances image fidelity and text editability, making it suitable for applications like style transfer. Recent advancements include compatibility with various tools and accelerated inference, showcasing cutting-edge technology in the field of image generation.

summary.en: Llama3-Chinese is a large language model based on Meta-Llama-3-8B, trained using DORA and LORA+ methods on 500k high-quality Chinese multi-turn SFT data, 100k English multi-turn SFT data, and 2k single-turn self-cognition data. This model focuses on Chinese multi-turn dialogue, suitable for applications like intelligent customer service and educational tutoring, demonstrating strong language understanding and generation capabilities.

summary.en: Agently is a development framework for rapidly building Generative AI applications, simplifying interactions with GenAI agents through structured data and chained-call syntax. Its event-driven TriggerFlow feature efficiently manages complex workflows and allows model switching without code rewrites, ensuring stable outputs and maintainable workflows, suitable for production-grade AI application development.

summary.en: Meta Llama 3 is a powerful large language model designed to empower individuals, creators, researchers, and businesses to innovate and experiment. This version supports pre-trained and instruction-tuned models ranging from 8B to 70B parameters, suitable for various applications. With simplified loading and inference examples, users can quickly get started and leverage its capabilities. The project also offers integration with Hugging Face for easy model downloads and usage.

summary.en: The IDM-VTON project aims to enhance diffusion models for authentic virtual try-on experiences. This technology can be widely applied in e-commerce and virtual fashion, improving user interactivity and realism in online shopping. Key highlights include support for VITON-HD and DressCode datasets, along with efficient training and inference processes that generate high-quality clothing try-on results.

summary.en: AniPortrait is an innovative framework for generating high-quality portrait animations driven by audio and reference images. It supports face reenactment and video-driven animation synthesis, making it suitable for game development and film production. Key features include audio-driven animation generation and an efficient pose retargeting strategy that handles complex pose variations, enhancing realism and interactivity.

It provides data in JSON format, facilitating developers to build poetry-related applications, aiming to preserve and promote Chinese culture while addressing the challenges of accessing traditional literature.

summary.en: Streamer-Sales is an innovative sales anchor LLM that generates engaging product descriptions based on product features to enhance the shopping experience. It integrates advanced technologies such as inference acceleration, ASR, TTS, and digital human generation, suitable for both online live sales and offline promotions, helping merchants boost sales efficiency. Its flexible architecture and real-time feedback mechanism ensure optimized shopping interactions.

summary.en: Coqui TTS is an advanced Text-to-Speech generation library that supports pretrained models in over 1100 languages. It provides tools for training new models and fine-tuning existing ones, along with utilities for dataset analysis and curation. The library is battle-tested in research and production, suitable for various applications like voice assistants and accessibility technologies, featuring low-latency real-time speech generation.

summary.en: SadTalker is an audio-driven single-image talking face animation tool that generates realistic 3D motion coefficients from a single portrait image and audio, creating lifelike talking head videos. Released at CVPR 2023, it offers high-quality video generation and is integrated into Discord for free use. Key features include full-body image mode support and integration with the stable diffusion WebUI.

summary.en: OpenVoice is an instant voice cloning tool developed by MIT and MyShell, featuring accurate tone color cloning and flexible voice style control. Its zero-shot cross-lingual cloning capability allows users to generate speech in multiple languages without requiring training data. The latest version, V2, enhances audio quality, supports multiple languages, and permits commercial use, catering to the voice synthesis needs of users worldwide.

summary.en: Clone Voice is a web-based sound cloning tool that allows users to synthesize speech using their own voice or any sound. The tool supports multiple languages and is easy to use without requiring high-performance GPUs, making it suitable for audio production and voice-over scenarios. Its core technology is based on the open-source xtts_v2 model, delivering high-quality speech synthesis, especially excelling in English synthesis.

summary.en: This project is an H5-based video streaming and live broadcasting system that integrates flv.js and vue-video-player. It supports RTMP, HTTP-FLV, and HLS video stream formats, making it suitable for video surveillance and real-time broadcasting scenarios. It features low latency and high compatibility to meet various video playback needs.

summary.en: DeepFaceLive is a real-time face swap tool designed for PC streaming and video calls. Users can replace their face with faces from videos using trained facial models, creating realistic effects. The project supports various public facial models, making it suitable for live streaming and social interactions, enhancing user experience and entertainment.

summary.en: DDColor is an image colorization tool based on dual decoders, aimed at achieving photo-realistic colorization effects. By optimizing learnable color tokens and utilizing multi-scale visual features, it provides vivid and natural colorization for historical black-and-white photos and anime game landscapes. It excels in automatic image colorization, suitable for historical restoration, artistic creation, and various other applications.

summary.en: anyLive is an open-source RTMP streaming and playback project based on WebRTC, supporting multiple platforms including Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac. Key features include customizable audio/video capture and rendering, GPU beauty filters, screen sharing, and support for various streaming protocols (e.g., RTMP, HLS). This project is suitable for both live streaming and video on demand, offering flexible UI customization and low-latency streaming experiences.

summary.en: Heimdallr is a lightweight notification gateway that aggregates various push channels and features Serverless deployment for nearly zero-cost operation. It is compatible with multiple notification services such as Bark and WeChat Work, offering flexible configuration options and rich functionalities, ideal for developers and teams needing efficient notification delivery. Users can quickly get started with its configuration generator, addressing webhook integration issues.

metadata.name: parler-tts

summary.en: Parler-TTS is a lightweight text-to-speech (TTS) model capable of generating high-quality, natural-sounding speech tailored to specific speaker characteristics such as gender, pitch, and speaking style. This fully open-source project provides all datasets, preprocessing, training code, and weights, enabling the community to develop their own TTS models. The latest release includes two checkpoints, an 880M and a 2.3B parameter model, optimized for faster generation, suitable for various applications.

summary.zh: autMan æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº AI å’Œæœºå™¨äººæŠ€æœ¯çš„å¯æ‰©å±•ä¸ªäººåŠ©ç†è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§é€šè®¯è½¯ä»¶çš„æ·±åº¦é›†æˆã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬é«˜åº¦ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–çš„æœåŠ¡ã€è‡ªæˆ‘è¿›åŒ–èƒ½åŠ›å’Œè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–å·¥ä½œæµç®¡ç†ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿæ‰§è¡Œå¤æ‚ä»»åŠ¡å¦‚é‚®ä»¶æ¸…ç†å’Œå¸‚åœºç›‘æ§ã€‚æ”¯æŒå¤šç§ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€çš„æ’ä»¶æ‰©å±•ï¼Œå…¼å®¹ä¸»æµå¤§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œå…·å¤‡å®æ—¶æ¶ˆæ¯ç›‘å¬å’Œæ™ºèƒ½å“åº”åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€‚åˆéœ€è¦é«˜æ•ˆç®¡ç†æ—¥å¸¸ä»»åŠ¡çš„ç”¨æˆ·ã€‚
summary.en: autMan is an extensible personal assistant solution driven by AI and robotics, integrating deeply with various communication software. Its core features include highly personalized services, self-evolution capabilities, and automated workflow management, capable of executing complex tasks like email cleaning and market monitoring. It supports plugin extensions in multiple programming languages, is compatible with mainstream large models, and features real-time message listening and intelligent response, ideal for users needing efficient daily task management.

summary.en: gptsovits-api is an API interface for GPT-SoVITS, designed to enhance its audio synthesis capabilities. This project addresses the limitations of the original API in mixed-language support and sentence segmentation, allowing users to flexibly configure audio and models via command-line parameters. It supports voice cloning applications in Chinese, Japanese, and English, making it a significant tool in the audio synthesis domain with its straightforward usage and powerful features.

summary.en: ReverseTool is a comprehensive collection of reverse engineering tools covering various tech stacks including Java, C++, C#, and iOS. It offers multiple decompilation, debugging, and analysis tools for reverse engineering APKs, DLLs, and EXEs, supporting dynamic tracing and vulnerability queries, aiding security researchers and developers in understanding and analyzing software internals and behaviors.

summary.en: The 'Programmer's Guide to Live Longer' offers a collection of scientific evidence and practical advice aimed at helping programmers extend their lifespan through improved diet, exercise, and lifestyle habits. Key strategies include reducing all-cause mortality through dietary choices (such as increasing fruit and nut intake), regular exercise, and good sleep practices. The guide emphasizes not only health data but also the impact of psychological and social factors on longevity, making it suitable for programmers looking to enhance their quality of life.

The API is fully asynchronous, fast, easy to maintain, and suitable for secondary development, making it ideal for applications requiring music creation.

summary.en: Ciphey is a fully automated decryption, decoding, and cracking tool that utilizes natural language processing and artificial intelligence, allowing users to handle various encryption forms without knowing the key or cipher. Its convenient installation supports various platforms, greatly enhancing user accessibility.

summary.en: LKY Office Tools is a green, open-source automation tool designed to simplify the download, installation, and activation of Microsoft Office. Users can install the latest version of Office with one click and self-install additional components as prompted. The tool automatically detects the operating system architecture to ensure the correct version is downloaded and uses legitimate activation methods to maintain system security. Ideal for users looking to quickly deploy Office.

summary.en: This project is a tutorial for beginners on large model application development, integrating Alibaba Cloud server and personal knowledge base assistant to help developers quickly grasp large model development skills. It covers topics like introduction to large models, API calls, knowledge base construction, RAG application building, and validation iteration, aiming to guide learning through practice and lower the learning threshold. Suitable for developers with basic Python skills, it offers rich examples and techniques for rapid entry and advancement.

metadata.name: OOTDiffusion
metadata.description: [AAAI 2025] Official implementation of "OOTDiffusion: Outfitting Fusion based Latent Diffusion for Controllable Virtual Try-on"

summary.zh: OOTDiffusionæ˜¯åŸºäºæ½œåœ¨æ‰©æ•£çš„å¯æ§è™šæ‹Ÿè¯•è¡£çš„å®ç°ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨æœè£…èåˆæŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œæ”¯æŒåŠèº«å’Œå…¨èº«æ¨¡å‹ã€‚è¯¥é¡¹ç›®åœ¨VITON-HDå’ŒDress Codeæ•°æ®é›†ä¸Šè®­ç»ƒï¼Œæä¾›äº†ONNXæ”¯æŒå’Œå¤šç§æ¨¡å‹æ£€æŸ¥ç‚¹ï¼Œé€‚åˆæ—¶å°šè¡Œä¸šå’Œè™šæ‹Ÿè¯•è¡£åº”ç”¨ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åœ¨äºé«˜æ•ˆçš„å›¾åƒç”Ÿæˆå’Œæœè£…åŒ¹é…èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿä¸ºç”¨æˆ·æä¾›ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–çš„è™šæ‹Ÿè¯•è¡£ä½“éªŒã€‚
summary.en: OOTDiffusion is an implementation for controllable virtual try-on based on latent diffusion, utilizing outfitting fusion technology to support both half-body and full-body models. Trained on VITON-HD and Dress Code datasets, it offers ONNX support and various model checkpoints, making it suitable for the fashion industry and virtual fitting applications. Its key highlights include efficient image generation and garment matching capabilities, providing users with personalized virtual try-on experiences.

metadata.name: LocalAI

Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more. Features: Generate Text, MCP, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P and decentralized inference

It supports running various models on consumer-grade hardware without the need for a GPU, suitable for generating text, audio, video, and images. Its decentralized and distributed features enable efficient AI development and deployment in local environments.

summary.en: DdddOcr is a versatile CAPTCHA recognition SDK that supports offline recognition of various CAPTCHA types, including alphanumeric, Chinese, slider, and special character CAPTCHAs. The library is designed to be simple with minimal dependencies, offering an easy-to-use API for quick integration by developers. Its core features include text recognition, object detection, and slider CAPTCHA handling, with support for GPU acceleration and custom model imports to meet diverse application needs.

summary.en: Jeepay is an open-source payment system designed for internet enterprises, supporting multiple channel service providers and regular merchant modes. It integrates mainstream payment interfaces like WeChat Pay, Alipay, and Cloud Flash Pay. Built on Spring Boot and Ant Design Vue, it features high concurrency handling and distributed deployment capabilities, ensuring secure and reliable transactions. The system offers a user-friendly management interface, ideal for quick integration of various payment solutions.

summary.en: This project is a Python-based Weibo crawler that efficiently scrapes data from one or multiple Weibo users, including user profiles and posts. It supports outputting data in CSV, JSON formats, or storing it in various databases, and can download images and videos from posts. The crawler features periodic incremental scraping, making it suitable for users or researchers needing to monitor Weibo dynamics over time.

summary.en: VueUse is a collection of essential composition utilities for Vue 3, designed to enhance development efficiency. It supports tree-shaking, ensuring only the necessary features are included, and is fully SSR-friendly. VueUse enables developers to quickly build efficient and flexible Vue applications.

summary.en: The Gushi Namer project offers unique name options for children by randomly combining words from classic poetry. It supports various traditional texts, including the Book of Songs, Chuci, Tang poetry, and Song lyrics, allowing users to draw inspiration from cultural heritage. Although it doesn't employ AI technology, the randomly generated names often yield unexpected charm and humor, making it ideal for families seeking personalized naming.

summary.en: Pake is a lightweight tool that turns any webpage into a desktop app with a single command, supporting macOS, Windows, and Linux. Built on Rust Tauri, it offers faster performance and lower memory usage compared to traditional JS frameworks. Users can easily package apps via CLI or online building without complex configurations, making it suitable for beginners and developers alike.

summary.en: bookget is a digital ancient book download tool that supports over 50 digital libraries, designed to provide users with convenient access to ancient texts. The user manual and community support facilitate easy onboarding for users exploring the digital realm of ancient literature.

summary.en: Vaultwarden is an unofficial Bitwarden-compatible server written in Rust, ideal for self-hosted deployments. It offers a lightweight alternative that fully supports official Bitwarden clients, making it perfect for resource-constrained environments. The project's technical highlights include efficiency and compatibility, allowing users to manage passwords without compromising security.

With a simple interface, it features download acceleration, support for 24 threads, speed limiting, and user scripts, making it ideal for users needing bulk downloads. Supported sites include YouTube, Instagram, and Pixiv, catering to diverse downloading needs.

summary.en: This project is a cloud storage-based file system designed to provide efficient data management and access solutions. Its core value lies in simplifying file operations in cloud environments, supporting multiple cloud service platforms, and catering to scenarios requiring cross-platform file sharing and storage. Key technical highlights include flexible API interfaces and high scalability to meet diverse user needs.

Its core value lies in one-click deployment of OpenClaw and websites, supporting local LLM hosting, centralized server management, and enhanced security. It is ideal for developers and enterprises needing efficient management and rapid deployment.

With its intuitive interface and diverse features, it is ideal for users seeking efficient access to the internet while ensuring security and privacy.

Developed on the WeChat mini-program platform, it utilizes Tencent Cloud development technology for security and scalability, suitable for rapid iteration and small tool usage scenarios.

summary.en: NiceGUI is a Python-based UI framework that allows users to create intuitive web applications in the browser. It supports various elements like buttons, dialogs, and 3D scenes, making it ideal for micro web apps, dashboards, robotics projects, and smart home solutions. Its simplified data binding and auto-reload features enable developers to quickly build and debug applications, enhancing development efficiency.

summary.en: The 'Python - 100 Days from Novice to Master' is a comprehensive guide designed for beginners to systematically learn Python programming over 100 days. It covers essential topics such as Python basics, data structures, functions, and object-oriented programming, complemented by practical examples. This resource helps learners enhance their skills across various application fields like data science and automation testing. Its low entry barrier and rich ecosystem make Python a popular programming language.

summary.en: DooTask is an open-source online project management tool that integrates document collaboration, mind mapping, flowcharting, task distribution, and instant messaging. Its unique asymmetric encryption technology ensures secure communication, making it ideal for team collaboration and project management, enhancing work efficiency.

Recommended for fresh Windows installations, it offers multilingual support and various optimization features, such as disabling unnecessary services, turning off Windows telemetry, and cleaning system drives. summary.en: DragGAN is an interactive image editing tool based on Generative Adversarial Networks, enabling users to manipulate generated images precisely through simple point-based interactions. summary.en: Shermie-Proxy is a proxy packet capture tool implemented in Go, supporting multiple protocols such as HTTP, HTTPS, WebSocket, TCP, and Socks5. It automatically identifies inbound protocols, intercepts, and modifies packets, making it suitable for network debugging and security testing. This tool simplifies the data capture process, allowing users to monitor various protocols on a single port with flexible extensibility and high performance.

summary.en: DeepSeek is an open-source PHP project that enables users to engage in AI conversations and image generation using the DeepSeek-R1 model. It employs a streaming communication mode, supports Markdown formatting and code highlighting, making it suitable for PHP beginners. Users can easily configure API keys without the need for a database, with features including contextual conversations, error handling, and custom API calls. The project aims to facilitate AI application sharing among individuals or small groups, providing comprehensive support and a communication platform.

summary.en: Smoji is a social emoji project designed to provide a rich selection of emojis for federated social applications like Mastodon, Pleroma, and Misskey. It includes various default emoji packs and some fun little emojis, suitable for websites and comment systems. Users can easily import emojis via simple commands, enhancing the fun of social interactions.

It supports PHP 7.3 and above, leveraging Redis for performance, making it suitable for developers needing to quickly build efficient APIs.

summary.en: SMSBoom is a tool for SMS bombing that has been suspended due to judicial reasons. It allows users to send messages through custom interface definitions, keyword replacements, and multi-threaded requests. Although currently unusable, SMSBoom emphasizes usability, making it suitable for beginners, with an executable file for Windows systems. Key features include command-line support, proxy calls, and a user-friendly interface.

summary.en: DTM is a distributed transaction framework that supports various transaction modes such as SAGA, TCC, and XA, aiming for cross-service eventual data consistency. It is applicable in scenarios like cache management, inventory deduction, and non-monolithic order systems. Supporting multiple programming languages and database engines, it features high availability and easy horizontal scaling, effectively addressing data consistency issues in microservices architectures.

summary.en: Colossal-AI is a framework designed to make training large AI models cheaper, faster, and more accessible. It offers efficient distributed training solutions that support various GPU configurations, allowing users to quickly start and run in cloud environments. With Colossal-AI, users can easily train large-scale models, applicable in fields like natural language processing and computer vision, significantly enhancing the processing capabilities of AI workloads.

summary.en: LlmKira/Openaibot is a powerful chatbot framework that supports multiple platforms including Discord, Slack, Kook, and Telegram. It features a message queuing and snapshot system, allowing for plugin mechanisms and authentication to ensure secure plugin execution. Following the OpenAI format schema, it offers a flexible plugin development ecosystem where users can customize environment variables, making it suitable for various applications like automated responses and intelligent assistants.

summary.en: Scribe is a tool for generating human-friendly API documentation from your Laravel codebase, offering a visually appealing single-page HTML doc with friendly text, code samples, and an in-browser API tester. It can extract request parameters, safely call API endpoints for sample responses, and supports generating Postman collections and OpenAPI specs. Users can customize the UI and data extraction strategies, making it ideal for developers seeking high-quality, maintainable API documentation.

summary.en: wechat-video-generate is a convenient tool designed for one-click generation of WeChat conversation videos. summary.en: Message Pusher is an open-source project based on Golang, designed to help users quickly set up a personalized message-pushing system. It supports various push methods such as email, WeChat, and QQ, allowing users to customize message content and delivery channels. The service requires only a single executable file, making it ready to use, suitable for scenarios like blog notifications, deep learning monitoring, and script execution alerts, showcasing great flexibility and usability.

Future versions will introduce more features and website support.

summary.en: Lingva Translate is an alternative front-end for Google Translate, offering a free and open-source translation service with support for over a hundred languages. The project scrapes content from Google Translate, preventing direct access to Google services and protecting user privacy. Technically, Lingva is built with TypeScript, React, and Next.js, incorporating efficient testing tools and GraphQL handling, making it suitable for users and developers needing a customizable translation service.

summary.en: The 2026 Airport Recommendation project offers a selection of high-performance airport services for users needing to bypass restrictions. It compiles features, URLs, and node types of various airports, assisting users in choosing the right one based on their needs. Key highlights include support for multiple protocols (like SSR, V2ray, Trojan, etc.) and detailed categorization based on speed, stability, and cost-effectiveness, catering to diverse user scenarios.

summary.en: Tabby (formerly Terminus) is a highly configurable terminal emulator that integrates SSH and serial client capabilities for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Its core value lies in offering rich features such as split panes, theming, customizable shortcuts, and full Unicode support, making it ideal for developers and system administrators managing remote environments. Tabby also supports direct file transfers and encrypted SSH configurations, enhancing user experience.

Monthly updates introduce new interfaces, including train ticket queries, weather forecasts, and more, making it ideal for developers needing quick API integration. Following its official account allows access to keys and updates, significantly enhancing development efficiency.

summary.en: ip2region is an offline IP address management framework that supports both IPv4 and IPv6, capable of handling billions of data segments with a query performance of ten microseconds. The project provides xdb data generation and query clients for various programming languages, making it suitable for applications requiring efficient IP localization and data management, such as network security and user geographic analysis. Its unique offline capability and high-speed querying make it advantageous for large-scale data processing and real-time localization.

summary.en: Synapse is an open-source Matrix homeserver developed in Python/Twisted, supporting federation, encryption, and VoIP functionalities. As part of the Matrix.org Foundation, Synapse aims to provide a secure communication platform for users. The project is actively maintained by Element, making it suitable for users needing custom configurations and high security. Its documentation provides detailed instructions for installation, configuration, and upgrades, catering to developers and system administrators.

summary.en: Gitea is a lightweight self-hosted Git service designed for a fast and easy setup experience. It integrates features such as code hosting, code review, team collaboration, package management, and CI/CD, making it suitable for various development teams. Developed in Go, Gitea supports multiple platforms and architectures, ensuring broad compatibility and efficiency.

summary.en: Gogs is a simple, stable, and extensible self-hosted Git service designed for painless setup. It supports multiple platforms, including Linux, macOS, and Windows, making it suitable for individuals and small teams. Gogs offers rich features such as user management, SSH access, webhook support, and various database backends, ensuring efficient code management and collaboration.

summary.en: This project is a third-party cloud solution for the Baota panel developed in PHP, supporting private deployment to ensure user privacy and security. It offers flexibility without mandatory account binding, allowing users to customize panel features. The project includes the latest installation packages for Baota Linux and Windows panels, supports one-click plugin synchronization and incremental updates, suitable for users with programming and Linux operation skills.

summary.en: php-ext-xlswriter is an efficient PHP extension designed for creating and reading XLSX files. It supports writing text, numbers, formulas, and hyperlinks across multiple worksheets with full Excel format compatibility and memory optimization features, making it suitable for handling large-scale data exports. This extension runs on multiple platforms including Linux and Windows, addressing performance bottlenecks faced by traditional PHPExcel when dealing with large datasets, ideal for developers needing efficient Excel file operations.

summary.en: This project offers detailed data on China's administrative divisions, including five levels: provincial, prefectural, county, township, and village. It is suitable for government statistics, geographic information systems, and related applications. The data is based on standards from the National Bureau of Statistics, available for download in multiple formats (JSON, CSV), facilitating integration and use by developers, with the latest updates reflecting 2023 statistics.

summary.en: This project offers a powerful Weibo search tool that retrieves content based on keywords or topics, supporting various output formats including CSV and multiple databases. Its technical highlights include an efficient crawling architecture and flexible configuration options capable of handling massive datasets.

summary.en: This project offers the latest 2025 SQL and JSON files for China's provinces, cities, districts, and streets, supporting four-level and five-level geographic information linkage. The data is sourced from JD.com and the National Bureau of Statistics. It features an automated updating crawler, allowing users to quickly obtain the latest data, suitable for geographic information systems, data analysis, and application development. Both PHP and Golang crawler implementations are provided for user convenience.

Its core value lies in simplifying tedious task processes, requiring users only to manually enter the task interface while the script handles subsequent operations automatically. The project is continuously updated, optimizing task execution logic and enhancing user experience, making it suitable for avid e-commerce event participants.

It supports various collection modes, including user information, posts, followers, and comments. With a concise core codebase, it is highly customizable, making it suitable for developers and data scientists engaged in data analysis and social media research.

By following these practices, developers can enhance code quality, maintainability, and performance, suitable for Laravel projects of all sizes. The project also provides multilingual translations for global accessibility.

summary.en: Aurora is a multi-platform download tool for circumventing internet restrictions, supporting Android, Windows, and Mac OS. The core value of this project lies in providing stable version download links, ensuring smooth access in restricted network environments. Its technical highlights include multiple download sources and anti-blocking features, making it suitable for users needing to bypass censorship.

summary.en: QTTabBar is a lightweight tool that enables tabbed multi-label functionality in Windows Explorer, significantly enhancing work efficiency. summary.en: Sherlock is a powerful tool designed to hunt down social media accounts by username across over 400 social networks. It supports querying multiple users and saves results in text files for easy management and analysis. Key features include support for Tor network for enhanced privacy protection and multiple output formats (like CSV and XLSX), making it ideal for security researchers and social media analysts.

summary.en: ShopXO is an enterprise-level free and open-source e-commerce system's uniapp mobile theme source code, supporting multiple mini-program platforms (such as WeChat, Alipay, etc.), H5, and APP. The project offers a visual DIY drag-and-drop decoration feature, built-in various standard components, and theme color options, enabling users to quickly build personalized stores according to their needs. Its flexibility and ease of use make it suitable for various e-commerce scenarios.

summary.en: ShopXO is an enterprise-level free and open-source e-commerce system that supports multi-end adaptive layouts, including PC, H5, and mini-programs, catering to multi-vendor and multi-store needs. Its visual DIY drag-and-drop decoration feature and rich component library allow users to easily customize their e-commerce platforms, suitable for various industries. Developed based on the ThinkPHP8 framework and released under the MIT open-source license, it supports secondary development, significantly reducing the cost of e-commerce setup for enterprises.

summary.en: The backend project of the Campus Integrated Service Platform aims to provide users with convenient campus services. This platform supports collaboration between the backend management and mini-program front-end, featuring easy installation and usage. Users can start the service with simple commands and log in using default credentials, making it suitable for university administrators and students to enhance campus service efficiency.

summary.en: Beanbun is a multi-process web crawling framework written in PHP, offering high extensibility and openness. It supports both daemon and normal modes for distributed crawling, utilizes Guzzle as the downloader, and features a flexible plugin mechanism. With support for various queue methods and customizable crawling strategies, it is ideal for efficient data extraction applications.

It supports various data extraction methods and formats, handles dynamic rendering pages, and offers rich plugin extension capabilities, making it suitable for data analysis and market research.

summary.en: WeiboSpider is a powerful web scraping tool for Sina Weibo, developed in Python, capable of extracting detailed data from single or multiple Weibo users, including user profiles and posts. Users can save the data in various formats (such as TXT, CSV, JSON) or store it in databases (like MySQL, MongoDB). Additionally, it supports downloading images and videos from Weibo, making it suitable for data analysis and social media research.

summary.en: php-DFA-filterWord is a sensitive word filtering library based on the Deterministic Finite Automaton (DFA) algorithm, supporting Composer installation. It efficiently detects and replaces sensitive words in text, making it suitable for content moderation scenarios such as social media and forums. The library offers various functionalities for handling sensitive words, including marking, replacing, and retrieving lists of sensitive words, allowing developers to integrate and use it quickly.

summary.en: nvm is a tool for managing multiple Node.js versions, allowing quick installation and switching via the command line. It is ideal for developers needing different Node.js versions for various projects, ensuring compatibility and flexibility. Key features include POSIX compliance and a user-friendly command-line interface, significantly enhancing Node.js development efficiency.

summary.en: This project offers AI prediction capabilities for the Double Color Ball and Super Lotto, utilizing deep learning models for data training and forecasting. Users can easily set up the environment and fetch training data, with flexible configuration of model parameters. Key features include data scraping and prediction for the Super Lotto, along with evaluation of model predictions, aimed at lowering the entry barrier for developers and researchers interested in lottery predictions.

With Eloquent ORM, users can easily manage data relationships while enjoying a clean code structure. The project offers both online reading and local download options, making it suitable for developers looking to deepen their understanding of Laravel.

summary.en: jieba-php is an efficient PHP Chinese word segmentation module that supports multiple segmentation modes (accurate, full, and search engine modes), suitable for text analysis and search engine construction. The project is based on Trie trees and dynamic programming algorithms, capable of handling traditional Chinese, and supports custom dictionaries and part-of-speech tagging. It is designed to provide fast and accurate Chinese text processing, ideal for developers and applications requiring Chinese segmentation.

It supports complex HTTP requests, offers powerful content filtering, and has a modular design, making it suitable for scenarios like multithreaded crawling and scraping dynamic pages, enabling developers to quickly build efficient web crawlers.

It focuses on performance and safety through whole code analysis and optimizations, supporting strict type checks and compile-time optimizations. Although KPHP has some limitations, such as not supporting certain PHP features, it offers an effective solution for developers needing high-performance PHP applications.

summary.en: Svelte is a novel framework for building web applications, utilizing a compiler to transform declarative components into efficient JavaScript that precisely updates the DOM. Its open-source nature and active community support make Svelte popular among developers for projects of all sizes.

summary.en: isign is a tool and library for re-signing iOS applications without relying on proprietary Apple software or hardware. summary.en: MockingBird is a real-time voice cloning tool based on PyTorch, capable of generating arbitrary speech in just 5 seconds. It supports multiple Chinese datasets and is compatible with both Windows and Linux systems. Users can easily achieve high-quality speech synthesis using a newly trained synthesizer. This project is suitable for applications requiring quick speech generation, such as voice assistants and game dubbing. Although it is no longer actively updated, a cloud-optimized version is still available.

summary.en: kuaishou-crawler is a tool for scraping user videos and images from the Kuaishou platform. The project is refactored using object-oriented programming, supporting retrieval of works based on user IDs, and provides an executable version for easy execution. Users must log in to the Kuaishou website and configure cookies to ensure the validity of the scraping. This tool is suitable for developers and researchers for data collection but must comply with legal regulations to avoid illegal use.

summary.en: This repository offers 2624 technical questions and exercises related to DevOps and SRE, covering various domains such as Linux, Jenkins, and AWS. It is suitable for individuals preparing for a career as a DevOps engineer, although most questions do not fully represent actual interviews. Users can also contribute by submitting pull requests to add more exercises, fostering learning and collaboration.

summary.en: Tencent's Secure Coding Guide is designed for developers, offering an analysis of API-level security risks and practical secure coding solutions. Based on the DevSecOps philosophy, it aims to help developers avoid vulnerabilities from the source. Applicable for daily reference, writing security scanning strategies, and vulnerability remediation, it covers security standards across multiple programming languages to promote secure coding practices.

summary.en: This is an MQTT protocol analysis and coroutine client for PHP, supporting MQTT versions 3.1, 3.1.1, and 5.0. The library implements multiple Quality of Service (QoS) levels and supports MQTT communication over WebSocket. As the first PHP library to support the MQTT 5.0 protocol, it provides an efficient messaging solution suitable for IoT and real-time data transmission applications.

summary.en: This repository serves as a comprehensive resource package for learning Golang, including articles, books, academic papers, theoretical analyses, open-source frameworks, cloud-native technologies, as well as videos and practical sharing PPTs from industry experts. It aims to help developers deeply understand and master the Go language, suitable for both beginners and advanced users.

summary.en: This project is a Vue-based draggable component plugin designed for page layout in backend management systems. It divides the interface into three sections: the left for common module components, the middle for draggable composition, and the right for modifying component properties with real-time previews. The plugin enhances user experience and efficiency by allowing dynamic page layout adjustments.

summary.en: Antmove is a mini-program converter that simplifies the process of converting Alipay and WeChat mini-programs into mini-programs for other platforms, greatly easing cross-platform development. Key features include one-click conversion, detailed compile and runtime logs, readable generated code, and support for secondary programming, making it ideal for developers to quickly migrate and reuse existing code, enhancing development efficiency.

metadata.name: Ventoy

summary.en: Ventoy is an open-source tool designed to simplify the creation of bootable USB drives. Users can simply copy ISO, WIM, IMG, VHD(x), or EFI files to the USB drive without repeated formatting, and boot them through a selection menu. It supports various operating systems, including Windows, Linux, and Unix, compatible with x86 and ARM architectures, and has been tested with over 1300 ISO files, making it suitable for a wide range of applications.

summary.en: flipped-aurora/gin-vue-admin is an enterprise-level development platform based on Vite, Vue3, and Gin, featuring AI-assisted capabilities and supporting mixed use of TS and JS. The project offers essential development features such as JWT authentication, permission management, and dynamic routing, aimed at accelerating the generation of foundational front-end and back-end code, suitable for rapid development of enterprise applications.

metadata.name: gorse
metadata.description: AI powered open source recommender system engine supports classical/LLM rankers and multimodal content via embedding

summary.zh: Gorse æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº AI çš„å¼€æºæ¨èç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨å¿«é€Ÿé›†æˆåˆ°å„ç§åœ¨çº¿æœåŠ¡ä¸­ã€‚å®ƒæ”¯æŒå¤šç§æ¨èç®—æ³•ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ç»å…¸æ¨èå’ŒåŸºäºå¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹çš„æ¨èï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿå¤„ç†æ–‡æœ¬ã€å›¾åƒå’Œè§†é¢‘ç­‰å¤šæ¨¡æ€å†…å®¹ã€‚Gorse æä¾›ç”¨æˆ·å‹å¥½çš„ GUI ä»ªè¡¨æ¿å’Œ RESTful APIï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿æ•°æ®ç®¡ç†å’Œæ¨èè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œé€‚åˆéœ€è¦ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–æ¨èçš„åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Gorse is an AI-powered open-source recommender system designed for quick integration into various online services. It supports multiple recommendation algorithms, including classical and LLM-based recommenders, and can handle multimodal content such as text, images, and videos. Gorse offers a user-friendly GUI dashboard and RESTful APIs for data management and recommendation requests, making it suitable for applications requiring personalized recommendations.

summary.en: Win11React is an open-source project aimed at replicating the Windows 11 desktop experience using standard web technologies like React, CSS, and JavaScript. It offers a rich set of features including a Start Menu, desktop interactions, and window management, making it suitable for developers and enthusiasts to experience and learn front-end development. Although not affiliated with Microsoft, it showcases the power of modern web technologies.

summary.en: Go-Crontab is a task scheduler manager based on Golang, specifically designed for the Windows environment, addressing the lack of effective scheduling tools. It supports both second-level and minute-level task scheduling, automatically recognizing the operating system to execute the corresponding commands. Users can define multiple scheduled tasks through a custom JSON configuration file, with automatic log generation for execution tracking, and it features cross-platform compatibility for Windows, Linux, and MacOS.

metadata.name: shadowsocks-windows
metadata.description: A C# port of shadowsocks

summary.en: Shadowsocks for Windows is a C# port of a proxy tool that offers system proxy configuration, PAC mode, user-defined rules, and server auto-switching. It supports HTTP proxy and UDP relay, making it suitable for users needing secure internet access. The project's technical highlights include flexible configuration options and multi-instance management, catering to both developers and general users.

metadata.name: goproxy.cn

summary.zh: Goproxy.cn æ˜¯ä¸­å›½æœ€å—ä¿¡ä»»çš„ Go æ¨¡å—ä»£ç†ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨è§£å†³ä¸­å›½å¼€å‘è€…åœ¨è®¿é—® Go æ¨¡å—æ—¶é¢ä¸´çš„ç½‘ç»œé™åˆ¶é—®é¢˜ã€‚è¯¥é¡¹ç›®å®Œå…¨å®ç°äº† GOPROXY åè®®ï¼Œå¹¶ç”±çŸ¥åäº‘æœåŠ¡æä¾›å•†ä¸ƒç‰›äº‘æ”¯æŒï¼Œæä¾›å…è´¹ã€å¯é ä¸”å…¨çƒåŠ é€Ÿçš„æœåŠ¡ã€‚Goproxy.cn é€šè¿‡ç¼“å­˜æ¨¡å—çš„åŸå§‹çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œç¡®ä¿æ•°æ®çš„å®Œæ•´æ€§å’Œå®‰å…¨æ€§ï¼Œé€‚åˆæ‰€æœ‰ Go å¼€å‘è€…ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: Goproxy.cn is the most trusted Go module proxy in China, designed to address network restrictions faced by developers in accessing Go modules. Fully implementing the GOPROXY protocol and supported by the renowned cloud service provider Qiniu Cloud, it offers a free, reliable, and globally accelerated service. Goproxy.cn ensures data integrity and security by caching modules in their original state, making it suitable for all Go developers.

Users simply input their phone number to generate a QR code, which can be printed for temporary parking use. The tool supports various scanning methods, simplifying the dialing process and enhancing user experience.

summary.en: BiliDuang is a C# based Bilibili video downloader that supports various formats and resolutions, including 4K, watermark-free, and interactive videos. Users can log in to access their watchlist and favorites, with support for region-restricted downloads. The software features Material Design and offers rich functionality, suitable for educational purposes, while adhering to copyright regulations.

summary.en: GoGoCode is a transformer for JavaScript/TypeScript/HTML based on Abstract Syntax Tree (AST), offering an intuitive API. It features a jQuery-like syntax for selecting and transforming AST, along with a regex-like syntax for code matching and replacement, simplifying the code transformation process. Ideal for developers needing quick refactoring and migration, especially in scenarios like transitioning from Vue and ElementUI to Vue3 and ElementPlus.

summary.en: Taper is an efficient and extensible WeChat bot framework developed in C++, designed to provide a stable solution with low memory usage. The framework supports plugin development, utilizes a multi-process model to ensure plugin sandboxing, and employs TCP for reliable inter-process communication. The project is suitable for technical research and learning, inviting developers to collaborate on maintenance and improvement.

summary.en: Brick Design is a low-code framework that offers drag-and-drop layout capabilities for both flow and free layouts. Key features include visual drag-and-drop, real-time rendering, component spacing display, and state domain management, making it suitable for rapid development of complex user interfaces. This framework is particularly useful for applications requiring quick development and flexible layouts.

summary.en: Reading is a customizable tool for web literature enthusiasts, designed to enhance the reading experience. By offering professional search capabilities, users can conveniently access the latest chapters from various websites, reducing wasted time while promoting the dissemination of quality web literature. The project has migrated to a new address and has been redeveloped in Kotlin, emphasizing open-source principles and user privacy protection.

summary.en: go-gin-api is a modular API framework based on the Gin framework, designed to simplify the business development process. It integrates various common features such as CORS support, JWT validation, logging, tracing, and Prometheus monitoring, enabling rapid development and efficient management, suitable for projects requiring quick iterations. The framework also emphasizes code standards to help teams avoid chaos.

summary.en: Lizhi Reader is an open-source tool for searching online literature, designed to provide users with a convenient reading experience. By submitting book title keywords to various third-party websites, it helps users quickly access the latest chapters, minimizing search time. The software emphasizes user privacy protection and does not take responsibility for third-party content, encouraging users to discover excellent online novels and promoting the dissemination and development of online literature.

summary.en: WeChatSeptet-ForMac is a lightweight Mac WeChat assistant designed to enhance user experience with convenient features. Although the project is no longer maintained, it still offers essential functionalities for users seeking a simplified WeChat operation.

summary.en: v2rayNG is an Android client for V2Ray, supporting both Xray and v2fly cores. This project offers convenient proxy services, handling geoip and geosite data, with updates and support available via Telegram. Developed in Kotlin, it supports Android API 24 and above, making it suitable for users needing internet access, with good extensibility and community backing.

summary.en: This project offers a Vue-based frontend solution designed to simplify the super signing and non-signing packaging process for enterprise-level iOS applications. Users can quickly complete Android packaging and enterprise signing through a self-distribution feature, enhancing development and release efficiency. The project also provides detailed deployment tutorials for easy onboarding.

With no bandwidth limitations, it is suitable for both personal and enterprise use, offering a secure and flexible storage solution.

summary.en: The Chinese kinship calculator offers a convenient way to compute and understand family titles, addressing the confusion many face regarding relatives. Users can quickly obtain accurate titles by inputting relevant terms. The tool supports various appellations and reverse lookup, accommodating regional naming customs, greatly facilitating the use of titles during family gatherings.

summary.en: Nosqlclient, formerly known as Mongoclient, is a cross-platform, self-hosted MongoDB management tool that supports MongoDB 4.0 and above. It features an intuitive interface, making it suitable for developers and database administrators. Although the project is no longer actively developed, it can still be installed and used via Docker, catering to users needing self-hosted solutions.

summary.en: Another Redis Desktop Manager is a fast and stable Redis desktop management tool compatible with Linux, Windows, and Mac. It efficiently loads massive key-value pairs without crashing, offering a user-friendly interface ideal for developers and operations personnel. The tool supports various installation methods, greatly enhancing user experience.

summary.en: Laravel Octane significantly enhances the performance of Laravel applications by leveraging high-powered application servers such as FrankenPHP, Open Swoole, Swoole, and RoadRunner. It boots the application once and keeps it in memory to handle requests at supersonic speeds, making it ideal for high-concurrency and rapid-response scenarios, thus greatly optimizing developer efficiency.

summary.en: MiniProgram-DouyinParse is a watermark-free Douyin video parsing mini-program that utilizes cloud development technology for quick deployment without a backend server. Users can easily parse Douyin video links by registering the mini-program and configuring the environment, making it suitable for developers and content creators needing video download functionality. The project's technical highlight lies in simplifying the video parsing process and lowering the development barrier.

summary.en: dev-sidecar is a sidecar tool designed to enhance developer experience by accelerating access to services like GitHub, Stack Overflow, and npm through local proxying to domestic acceleration channels. Key features include intelligent DNS resolution, request interception, and mirror switching, ensuring high availability and quick response times. It supports Windows, Mac, and Linux systems, making it ideal for users who frequently access external development resources.

summary.en: Smalls is a PHP extension package focused on watermark removal for short videos, supporting 21 mainstream platforms like Douyin, Kuaishou, and Weishi. This tool allows users to extract short videos and remove watermarks, making it suitable for developers integrating watermark removal features in short video applications. The project offers detailed documentation and examples for quick onboarding, although it is no longer actively maintained.

summary.en: The RoadRunner Laravel Bridge offers complete integration with RoadRunner, supporting HTTP, Jobs, gRPC, and Temporal plugins, surpassing Octane's capabilities. This package enables developers to easily configure and manage a high-performance runtime environment for Laravel applications, suitable for modern web applications requiring high concurrency and flexible plugin support.

summary.en: Reader is an open-source Win32 text and eBook reader designed for online literature enthusiasts, offering a convenient reading experience. It supports various file formats including TXT and EPUB, with extensive customization options such as font, line spacing, and background color. metadata.name: yanderifier
metadata.description: First-Order-Wrapper (formerly known as Yanderify) is a front-end tool for first-order-motion. It aims to make using first-order-motion face animation accessible to everyone, for education and entertainment.

summary.en: First-Order-Wrapper, formerly known as Yanderify, is a front-end tool designed to make first-order motion face animation accessible for education and entertainment. It provides a user-friendly interface that eliminates the need for command line knowledge and library installations, allowing users of any technical skill level to easily utilize it. The tool employs AI to animate a face image based on the movements of a source video, making it suitable for a wide range of applications.

summary.en: This repository contains over 60 original articles based on LeetCode problems, aimed at helping users understand the thought process behind algorithms rather than just memorizing solutions. The focus is on clarity and practical understanding, building reusable mental frameworks that make algorithm problems approachable and solvable. Ideal for learners looking to enhance their programming skills through LeetCode for job opportunities.

Its core highlights are the diverse API options and real-time updates, ideal for scenarios requiring quick integration of multiple APIs.

summary.en: V2Ray Core is a platform for building proxies aimed at helping users bypass network restrictions while securing their network connections and privacy. This project offers a robust set of network tools suitable for scenarios requiring secure internet access, such as circumventing censorship and data encryption. Its core technology is based on Go, supporting various network protocols with flexible configuration and extensibility.

Written in Swift, it supports multiple protocols including Trojan, Vmess, Shadowsocks, and Socks5. The client features subscription support, QR code scanning, clipboard import, and manual configuration, greatly enhancing the user experience for network access.

By modifying WeChatWin.dll and IM.dll files, it allows users to view messages even after they are retracted, and supports multi-instance functionality, enhancing the chat experience. The tool is user-friendly and ideal for users who want to retain chat records.

summary.en: Anti-recall is a non-root tool for Android that prevents message recall on WeChat and QQ, allowing users to capture and display recalled messages in real-time. summary.en: This project is a Douyin (TikTok) iOS app clone written in Objective-C, compatible with iOS 8.0 to iOS 12.0. It features personal homepage, video playback, and instant messaging functionalities, utilizing multi-queue for webp image parsing, AVPlayerLayer for video streaming, and WebSocket for chat. The project showcases extensive network request handling, data model conversion, and animation effects, making it suitable for developers to learn core iOS app development techniques.

summary.en: Prestissimo is a Composer 1.x plugin that significantly speeds up the installation process by downloading packages in parallel, making it ideal for developers building PHP projects quickly. The plugin excels in handling large dependencies, reducing installation time from 288 seconds to just 26 seconds, greatly enhancing development efficiency. It's important to note that Composer 2 already offers improved installation speed, so users are encouraged to upgrade Composer for better performance.

summary.en: The Spatie Laravel Backup package offers a modern backup solution for Laravel applications. It creates compressed backups containing specified directory files and database dumps, supporting storage on multiple filesystems. Users can easily execute backups with a simple Artisan command, and the package also includes backup monitoring to ensure health, with notifications available through various channels. Additionally, it features old backup cleanup to effectively save disk space.

summary.en: Fearless is a modern dashboard scaffolding based on Vue.js 3.x and TypeScript, built with Vite. It offers strong typing support and a complete engineering workflow, integrating modern frontend technologies like Pinia, Vue Router, and Naive UI, making it suitable for rapid development of enterprise-level applications. summary.en: Package Builder is a tool for quickly building Composer packages. Although the project is no longer maintained, it offers a convenient command-line interface for developers to generate standardized package structures. It is suitable for PHP developers, especially when creating and managing packages. Recommended alternatives include overtrue/php-package and overtrue/laravel-package.

Supports cross-domain, chunked and resumable file uploads. Works with any server-side platform (Google App Engine, PHP, Python, Ruby on Rails, Java, etc.) that supports standard HTML form file uploads.

summary.en: jQuery File Upload is a powerful file upload widget that supports multiple file selection, drag-and-drop uploads, progress bars, file validation, and previews. It supports cross-domain, chunked, and resumable uploads, working with various server-side platforms like PHP, Python, and Java. Based on HTML5 and JavaScript, it requires no additional plugins and is suitable for modern browsers, with graceful degradation support.

summary.en: sol-weapp is a simple and user-friendly marketing component library for WeChat mini-programs, offering various common components like lucky wheels, red envelope rain, and grid flipping. summary.en: Vant Weapp is a lightweight and reliable UI component library for WeChat Mini Programs, designed to provide developers with an efficient component usage experience. Its components are simply designed and easy to integrate, supporting npm installation, making it suitable for rapid development of mini program applications. The library offers a rich selection of components and excellent documentation, ideal for mobile developers.

summary.en: RAP2-Dolores is a front-end static build project based on React, designed to provide an efficient solution for API documentation and data mocking. It is a restructured version of RAP1, incorporating modern front-end technologies like Redux and SASS, and supports flexible configuration for development and production environments. Ideal for teams needing to quickly build and manage API documentation, enhancing development efficiency and collaboration.

The project also integrates CI tools like Jenkins and Nginx, enhancing development efficiency and project management.

metadata.name: rocky
metadata.description: Rocky Linux is a community enterprise Operating System designed to be 100% bug-for-bug compatible with Enterprise Linux created in response to the effective discontinuation of CentOS.

summary.zh: Rocky Linux æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¤¾åŒºé©±åŠ¨çš„ä¼ä¸šçº§æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨ä¸ä¼ä¸šçº§ Linux å®Œå…¨å…¼å®¹ï¼Œä½œä¸º CentOS è½¬å‹åçš„æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚è‡ª 2021 å¹´ 6 æœˆä»¥æ¥ï¼ŒRocky Linux æä¾›ç¨³å®šçš„ç”Ÿäº§ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œè‡´åŠ›äºä¸ºç”¨æˆ·æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªå¯é ã€é€æ˜çš„æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿã€‚è¯¥é¡¹ç›®å¼ºè°ƒç¤¾åŒºå‚ä¸ï¼Œç¡®ä¿å…¶å‘å±•ä¸å—å•†ä¸šåˆ©ç›Šé©±åŠ¨ï¼Œé€‚åˆå„ç§ç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒã€‚
summary.en: Rocky Linux is a community-driven enterprise operating system designed to be 100% bug-for-bug compatible with Enterprise Linux, serving as an alternative following CentOS's shift in direction. Since June 2021, Rocky Linux has provided stable production-ready releases, focusing on delivering a reliable and transparent OS. The project emphasizes community involvement, ensuring its development is free from corporate interests, suitable for various production environments.

summary.en: RAP2-DELOS is an open-source API management tool developed by Alibaba's front-end team, built on Koa and MySQL. It offers features like API documentation management, mock data, and export capabilities. The tool supports quick deployment via Docker, making it ideal for developers in API management and documentation generation, particularly valuable in team collaboration and project development. RAP2 aims to enhance API development efficiency and simplify documentation maintenance.

summary.en: PaddleFormers is a pre-trained large language model library based on PaddlePaddle, designed to provide a comparable experience to Hugging Face Transformers. It supports training for both large language models and vision-language models, featuring high performance and low resource consumption. By implementing various distributed training strategies and automatic mixed precision, PaddleFormers demonstrates exceptional training performance on key models, assisting users in efficiently training and optimizing large models.

summary.en: Laravel Enum is a simple, extensible, and powerful enumeration implementation designed for the Laravel framework. It supports enum key-value pairs, type hinting, attribute casting, and localization, making it suitable for applications requiring enumeration types. However, the library is no longer recommended for new projects as PHP 8.1 offers native enum support, prompting users to consider migration to the native solution.

summary.en: BookStack is an online document management system developed with Beego, designed to provide users with an efficient platform for knowledge sharing and management. BookStack balances aesthetics with mobile compatibility, making it suitable for team collaboration and personal knowledge management.

The system features a user-friendly interface and smooth operation, catering to various users.

It addresses common issues in multi-end development by encapsulating basic network requests, simplifying style references, and implementing custom tabBars and global modal dialogs. The goal is to build a shared component library for multi-end development, suitable for new projects.

summary.en: CardSystem is an efficient and secure online card key mall system that supports various payment channels, including Alipay, WeChat Pay, and multiple cryptocurrencies. The system offers flexible payment interfaces, making it suitable for e-commerce platforms and digital goods sales, ensuring transaction security and user experience. Its easy-to-install and update documentation allows developers to quickly get started, meeting market demands for card key transactions.
