summary.en: INFO-SPIDER is a comprehensive web scraping toolkit designed to help users securely and quickly retrieve and analyze their personal data from various sources. It supports a wide range of platforms, including social media, email services, and e-commerce sites. Users can easily gather their scattered personal information and visualize it for deeper insights into their data usage. The tool is open-source and transparent, making it ideal for users looking to manage their personal data effectively.

summary.en: The Campus Integrated Service Platform is a multifunctional service system based on WeChat Mini Programs, designed to provide a convenient service experience for campus users. The project includes a front-end mini program and back-end services, supporting order management, agent functionalities, and payment services. Key highlights include optimized backend logic and multiple fixes to ensure system stability and user experience, suitable for development and deployment in universities and surrounding service needs.

summary.en: SmartProxyPool is a high-quality, flexible open proxy pool service that supports dynamic proxies and various filtering options, suitable for web scraping and internal proxy needs. Although the project is no longer maintained for new features, its core features include proxy validation, a scoring system, and region-based filtering, making it ideal for scenarios requiring highly available proxies. The project offers a user-friendly WEB management interface for configuring and monitoring the proxy pool status.

Each example is well-documented to facilitate understanding and learning. The code is highly reusable, making it suitable for beginners to quickly grasp the fundamental concepts and techniques of web crawling.

summary.en: Lizhi Faka System is a PHP-based personal card issuing source code designed for ACG culture enthusiasts. Its core features include card key sales, wholesale discounts, payment integration, and automatic updates, supporting both PC and mobile interfaces. The system utilizes Eloquent ORM and Smarty template engine, offering good extensibility and usability, making it suitable for individuals or small teams to quickly set up a card issuing platform.

summary.en: Quark-h5 is an H5 page creation tool based on Vue2 and Koa2, designed to help non-coders easily create stunning H5 pages. The project offers complete front-end and back-end code along with detailed implementation ideas, allowing users to drag and drop components, edit styles, and store page data in a database through a visual editor. Its technical highlights include dynamic component rendering, state management, and flexible data structure design, making it suitable for developers and designers looking to quickly build H5 applications.

summary.en: PythonPlantsVsZombies is a simple Plants vs. Zombies game designed for personal learning and non-commercial use. The project features various plant and zombie characters, utilizes JSON files to store level data, and supports multiple game modes including day, night, and moving card select levels. It's ideal for Python and Pygame enthusiasts, offering a great learning opportunity.

summary.en: This project is a user center built on the Hyperf framework, designed to support the source code for the 'PHP Microservices Training' tutorial series. It offers user management and permission control features, making it suitable for learning and practicing PHP microservices architecture. The project includes detailed installation steps and commands for database migration and seeding, allowing developers to get started quickly.

summary.en: hyperf-watch is a hot reload script based on Swoole, designed to enhance Hyperf development efficiency. It automatically restarts the Hyperf service by monitoring file changes, making it suitable for development environments. The tool supports customizable configurations, allowing developers to flexibly adjust the watch directory, file extensions, and scan intervals, greatly facilitating their workflow.

summary.en: Vant is a lightweight, customizable Vue UI library designed for mobile web applications. It offers over 80 high-quality components with an average size of just 1KB and zero third-party dependencies, supporting both Vue 2 and Vue 3. Vant also features extensive documentation and theme customization, making it ideal for developers looking to quickly build mobile interfaces.

summary.en: This project is a H5 development template based on Vue CLI 4 and Vant UI, designed to provide best practices for large applications. The clear project structure includes a complete development framework, supporting internationalization, state management, and routing, making it suitable for team collaboration and complex business logic development. It comes with various useful tools and commands to help developers get started quickly and efficiently.

summary.en: This project is a Flutter-based short video application that mimics TikTok, providing a smooth video browsing experience with features like vertical swiping and liking. Currently supporting Flutter Web, it plans to expand to iOS, Android, MacOS, Linux, and Windows. The project includes dynamic video loading, preloading control, and customizable pages, making it suitable for developers to quickly build short video applications.

summary.en: The GD Graphics Library is an open-source library designed for programmers to dynamically create images. It supports various image formats, including JPEG, PNG, and GIF, and is commonly used in web development and graphic generation. Written in C, GD offers wrappers for multiple languages, making it ideal for generating charts, thumbnails, and more. Its flexibility and extensive format support make it a perfect choice for image processing.

summary.en: Phalcon is a high-performance, full-stack PHP framework delivered as a C extension, designed to reduce resource consumption. Written in Zephir/C, it supports multiple platforms including Windows, GNU/Linux, FreeBSD, and macOS, making it suitable for high-efficiency web application development. Phalcon's uniqueness lies in its execution speed and flexible extensibility, ideal for building complex web applications.

summary.en: Phalcon Devtools is a development tool for the Phalcon PHP framework, designed to accelerate application development. It simplifies the creation of controllers, models, modules, and more through code generation scripts, significantly enhancing development efficiency. The tool supports PHP 7.2 and above, and is compatible with Phalcon 4.0, making it suitable for high-performance, low-resource web application development.

summary.en: XXL-JOB is an efficient distributed task scheduling platform designed to offer simple and user-friendly task management features. Its core attributes include dynamic task management, high availability of the scheduling center, cluster deployment of task executors, and a variety of triggering strategies, making it suitable for enterprise-level applications requiring scheduled and dynamic tasks. The platform is widely adopted by various companies, enabling rapid development and expansion, truly out-of-the-box.

summary.en: easyswoole_panel is a backend management system developed on the EasySwoole framework, offering features like visual management, permission control, and a plugin marketplace. Key highlights include online service management, IP rate limiting, and online CURD generation, significantly simplifying developers' workflows. This project is suitable for developers looking to quickly build management backends, supporting front-end and back-end separation, enhancing system flexibility and scalability.

summary.en: myclabs/php-enum is a PHP enum implementation inspired by SplEnum, designed to fill the gap of missing enum functionality in PHP. This library allows developers to use enums as parameter and return types, providing enhanced type safety and extensibility. By defining enums, developers can easily manage a set of constants and leverage rich methods to manipulate these values, making it suitable for scenarios requiring clear states or options.

summary.en: Laibot is an open-source voice dialogue robot based on Raspberry Pi, aimed at enhancing human-computer interaction. The project leverages open-source hardware and free voice services to explore the potential of smart speakers, with a strong focus on user experience. Running on Python 3, Laibot provides an innovative platform for developers through its user-friendly interface and excellent scalability.

summary.en: Chat is a chatbot framework based on natural language understanding and machine learning, supporting multi-user concurrency and customizable multi-turn dialogues. It offers rich semantic analysis tools and knowledge graph construction capabilities, making it suitable for quickly building personalized chatbots and reducing repetitive work for developers. Its modular design and extensibility provide broad application potential in smart living and work.

summary.en: wukong-robot is a flexible and elegant Chinese voice dialogue robot project that supports multi-turn conversations and brain-machine interaction, aimed at helping Chinese Makers and Hackers quickly build personalized smart speakers. The project integrates multiple voice recognition and synthesis technologies, features a modular design, supports smart home control, and has gained widespread adoption with over 13,000 installations and more than 700,000 wake-up instances.

summary.en: PHP-Zipkin is an unofficial PHP library for OpenZipkin, designed to assist developers in implementing distributed tracing in PHP applications. Currently in an incomplete state, it supports only one transport method and provides minimal functionality for sending tracing information to Zipkin. Ideal for developers looking to integrate tracing features in frameworks like Laravel, with plans to add support for Symfony, Redis, HTTP, PDO, and Kafka in the future.

summary.en: The Across project offers a set of practical scripts designed to simplify server management and network configuration. Key features include configuring WireGuard VPN servers, auto-installing TCP BBR kernel, setting up KMS servers, performing I/O performance tests, and backing up databases. These tools enable users to efficiently manage and optimize their server environments, making it suitable for developers and system administrators.

Users can easily configure and extend fetching services, with Docker support for seamless integration.

summary.en: imi is a PHP microservice development framework that supports long connections and can run in various container environments like PHP-FPM and Swoole. It offers rich functionalities for developing HTTP, WebSocket, TCP, UDP, and MQTT services, making it ideal for internet microservices, instant messaging, and IoT scenarios. Since its launch in 2018, imi has been reliably used in multiple projects, featuring a powerful ORM, dependency injection, and microservice support.

summary.en: py12306 is a powerful ticket purchasing assistant that supports distributed, multi-account, and multi-task ticket buying. It features automatic captcha solving, ticket availability queries, and notifications via voice, email, and WeChat. Its unique Web management interface and Docker support allow users to easily manage purchasing tasks and configurations, making it ideal for users needing efficient ticket purchasing.

summary.en: Taichi Lang is an open-source, imperative parallel programming language designed for high-performance numerical computation, embedded in Python. It utilizes a JIT compiler to convert compute-intensive Python code into native GPU or CPU instructions, with broad applications in real-time physical simulation, augmented reality, and artificial intelligence. Taichi Lang stands out for its high compatibility with Python, flexibility, and exceptional performance, making it an ideal choice for scientific computing and graphics rendering.

summary.en: Canvas is a fully open-source Laravel package designed to help users quickly set up a blog. It offers a distraction-free writing experience and allows users to view monthly trends on content and reader traffic analysis. Ideal for developers looking to integrate blogging functionality into their existing Laravel applications, Canvas enhances content creation efficiency through a straightforward installation and configuration process.

summary.en: This repository compiles the latest summaries from programmers to CTOs, sharing technical documents and architectural practices from renowned companies like NetEase, JD, and Alibaba. It covers cutting-edge technologies such as big data, microservices, and distributed storage, making it suitable for developers looking to enhance their technical skills and architectural design. The continuously updated materials provide valuable learning resources and industry insights.

summary.en: The Exchange Rates API is a free service providing current and historical foreign exchange rates based on data published by the European Central Bank. It supports real-time exchange rate queries and historical data retrieval for various currencies, making it suitable for financial applications and data analysis. Built on Sanic, it efficiently handles thousands of requests asynchronously, ensuring fast responses and stability.

summary.en: Laravel Exchange Rates is a simple Laravel package designed for interacting with multiple exchange rate APIs. It supports fetching the latest or historical exchange rates and converting between different currencies, making it suitable for applications that handle multiple currencies, such as e-commerce platforms and financial apps. The package is compatible with PHP 8.0 and Laravel 8, offering flexible configuration and caching mechanisms for efficient rate queries and conversions.

summary.en: Lux is a fast and simple video download library and CLI tool written in Go. It supports various video platforms and offers features like multi-threaded downloads, retry mechanisms, and customizable output paths, making it suitable for both developers and casual users. Its straightforward installation and rich options make video downloading efficient and flexible.

metadata.name: Base

summary.en: Laravel Backpack/Base is a core package for Laravel 5.x that provides admin authentication and a blank admin panel based on AdminLTE. Although this package was used in Backpack v3, it has been integrated into Backpack/CRUD starting from v4. It supports basic menus, error pages, and a notification system, making it suitable for developers looking to quickly set up an admin backend.

summary.en: vbot is a bot framework based on the WeChat web protocol, supporting automatic replies and mass messaging for both WeChat and WeChat Work. This project is suitable for developers for learning and reference, providing stable API interfaces with anti-blocking mechanisms, ideal for enterprise customization and SCRM applications. It also integrates AI automatic reply features for quick chatbot development.

It features zero configuration, easy setup, and supports various databases (SQLite, Postgres, MySQL). With a RESTful API and user management capabilities, it is suitable for both individuals and teams.

summary.en: This project offers a comprehensive guide for scientific internet access, tailored for users looking to build their own proxy services. It covers detailed steps from purchasing VPS to setting up proxy services and client configurations, emphasizing the security and privacy benefits of self-hosting. Key highlights include Docker service setup, traffic obfuscation, and anti-detection techniques, making it suitable for users needing access to blocked websites, particularly tech-savvy individuals and developers.

summary.en: ycsocket is a lightweight WebSocket framework based on Swoole, designed for high-concurrency IO-intensive applications, supporting coroutine-based MySQL and Redis connection pools with automatic reconnection. This framework has been applied in large RPG game servers, offering an efficient PHP solution that balances performance and development efficiency, ideal for real-time communication scenarios.

summary.en: Crater is an open-source invoicing solution for individuals and businesses, designed to help users track expenses, payments, and create professional invoices and estimates. The web application is built with Laravel and VueJS, while mobile apps are developed using React Native, catering to users who need efficient financial management.

It offers a full-stack solution ideal for starting management systems from scratch, enabling rapid development and high-performance front-end presentation. Inspired by vue-element-admin, it aims to enhance management efficiency for enterprise applications.

summary.en: UnblockNeteaseMusic is a tool designed to unlock unavailable songs in Netease Cloud Music. It replaces song source links from various platforms (like QQ, Xiami, etc.) and offers comprehensive traffic proxy features, compatible with multiple clients (Windows, Android, macOS, etc.). The tool also supports proxy settings and custom server IPs, ensuring users can access restricted content and enhance their music experience.

summary.en: sorrypy is a Python-based GIF meme generator that allows users to create customized GIFs easily. The project supports multi-platform deployment, offering both Docker and standard installation methods, enhancing user experience. Its core highlight is the flexible template adaptation capability, making it suitable for social media, entertainment, and creative expression.

summary.en: The Tencent Cloud COS JS SDK (XML API) provides developers with convenient interfaces for file upload and management in browsers. This SDK supports HTML5 features, allowing users to upload files via AJAX and obtain temporary keys from the backend for security. It is suitable for front-end applications that need to integrate with Tencent Cloud Object Storage Service, featuring an easy-to-use interface and comprehensive documentation.

summary.en: Dash for iOS has been discontinued, and users are encouraged to switch to Dash for macOS. Dash provides offline access to over 150 API documentation sets for iPad and iPhone. Installation can be done via the App Store or Xcode, making it suitable for developers.

summary.en: DevDocs Desktop is a fully-featured desktop application designed to provide developers with fast, organized, and searchable access to API documentation. Based on DevDocs.io, it supports background operation and built-in shortcuts, enhancing the efficiency of document retrieval. Planned features include menubar mode and tab support to further optimize user experience.

summary.en: Solidity is a statically-typed, contract-oriented high-level programming language designed for implementing smart contracts on the Ethereum platform. It enables developers to create and execute smart contracts with logic related to value, ownership, and voting in a decentralized network. The rapid iteration and continuous updates of Solidity make it a core tool for blockchain development, suitable for various applications requiring secure and transparent transactions.

summary.en: Bitcoin Core is a software that connects to the Bitcoin peer-to-peer network to download and fully validate blocks and transactions. It includes a wallet and an optional graphical user interface, catering to users who need secure and efficient management of Bitcoin. The project is licensed under the MIT license, regularly releases stable versions, and encourages developers to conduct unit tests and code reviews to ensure software security and reliability.

summary.en: Hoppscotch is an open-source API development ecosystem that offers lightweight and fast request sending and response receiving capabilities, supporting various HTTP methods. It features highly customizable theme options and can be installed as a Progressive Web App, supporting offline use. Hoppscotch serves as an open-source alternative to Postman and Insomnia, ideal for developers to efficiently test and develop APIs in local, cloud, or offline environments.

summary.en: The 'Hacking Neural Networks: A Short Introduction' course focuses on exploiting and defending neural networks, covering techniques such as bug hunting and malware injection, as well as how to leverage existing neural networks for information extraction and backdooring. It includes practical exercises aimed at helping learners master these skills, making it suitable for developers and researchers interested in machine learning security.

summary.en: OneinStack is an efficient PHP/JAVA deployment tool that enables quick installation of LEMP, LAMP, LNMP, and other environments across various Linux distributions. It offers a wide selection of database and PHP versions, includes security optimizations, and supports both auto-installation and interactive operations, making it ideal for developers and operators to swiftly set up and manage applications in production environments. Its unique features include upgrade and backup scripts for multiple services, enhancing deployment flexibility and convenience.

summary.en: php-xtea is a PHP implementation of the XTEA encryption algorithm, offering binary-safe data encryption and decryption. The library supports flexible padding schemes and configurable encryption rounds, making it suitable for applications requiring secure data transmission. With a straightforward API, users can easily encrypt and decrypt data, ensuring security during transmission.

summary.en: The 'Advanced Go Programming' book is an open-source resource designed for developers seeking to deepen their understanding of Go language. It covers advanced topics such as CGO, Go assembly, RPC, Protobuf, web frameworks, and distributed systems, making it suitable for readers with a foundational knowledge of Go. The book offers practical examples and in-depth technical analysis to help developers apply advanced Go features in real projects.

Developed based on Auto.js Pro, it supports Android 7.0 and above. Although there is a risk of reduced earnings after use, it can still effectively improve browsing efficiency, suitable for users who frequently visit these e-commerce platforms. Update frequency is limited by the developer's work schedule, with ongoing improvements to the script's functionality.

summary.en: nwidart/laravel-modules is a modular package for managing large Laravel applications, supporting Laravel 11. By breaking the application into multiple modules, developers can organize code more efficiently, enhancing maintainability. The package has been reorganized and maintained, adding testing features to ensure higher stability and reliability. It is ideal for Laravel projects requiring modular management.

summary.en: php-beast is a PHP source code encryption extension that supports custom encryption modules and offers various encryption algorithms (such as AES, DES, Base64) to protect PHP project source code. The SDK offers a wide range of features, including auto-replies, menu operations, customer service messages, QR code generation, and user information queries, making it suitable for developers to quickly integrate and develop applications within the WeChat ecosystem.

summary.en: This project is an analysis of a spike system example, focusing on how to provide stable services under high concurrency. By studying the 12306 ticket grabbing system, it showcases the application of distributed architecture, load balancing techniques (like Nginx weighted round-robin), and pre-reserving inventory strategies to ensure high availability and performance optimization under extreme traffic. Suitable for high-concurrency scenarios in e-commerce and ticketing.

summary.en: Laravel-Pay is an elegant payment extension package that supports multiple payment methods including Alipay, WeChat, Douyin, and Jiangsu Bank. It simplifies payment integration in Laravel and Lumen applications, offering an intuitive API suitable for e-commerce and online services. The package requires PHP 8.0 or higher, providing excellent extensibility and ease of use, making it an ideal choice for developers to implement payment functionalities.

summary.en: This project offers an SDK and crawler tool for China's administrative division address database, sourced from Taobao's Cainiao Logistics, ensuring data authenticity and accuracy, including Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan. Typical applications include province, city, and district selection, address structuring, and address association, making it suitable for e-commerce and logistics systems. Users can quickly integrate it into their applications with simple Composer installation and API calls.

summary.en: The china_regions repository offers the latest JSON and SQL data for China's provinces, cities, and regions, automatically scraped from the National Bureau of Statistics. It covers administrative divisions down to the community level and supports multiple formats, making it suitable for developers in geographic information systems and data analysis. The project also provides an update mechanism to ensure data timeliness and accuracy.

summary.en: JADX is a powerful tool that decompiles Android Dex and Apk files into Java source code. It supports extracting Java code from APK, dex, aar, aab, and zip files, and can decode AndroidManifest.xml and other resources. With both command-line and GUI options, JADX includes deobfuscation features, making it ideal for developers and security researchers needing to analyze and debug Android applications.

metadata.name: select2

summary.en: Select2 is a jQuery-based replacement for select boxes that supports searching, remote datasets, and infinite scrolling of results. It enhances native selects with better multi-select interfaces, AJAX data loading, grouping, and tagging capabilities, making it suitable for handling large datasets. Compatible with various browsers, it is easy to integrate and customize, ideal for applications requiring complex selection functionalities.

summary.en: Payment is a PHP-based payment aggregation SDK that integrates popular payment methods such as WeChat Pay, Alipay, and China Merchants Bank's OneNet. It offers a unified interface to simplify the integration process for payment, query, refund, and transfer functionalities, significantly enhancing development efficiency. This project aims to address the complexity developers face when interfacing with multiple payment platforms, supporting PHP 7.0 and above, making it suitable for applications needing quick payment integration.

summary.en: This WeChat public platform Markdown online editor converts Markdown text into styles suitable for WeChat official accounts, streamlining the creation process so users can focus on content rather than formatting. It supports various lists, automatic conversion of external links to references, a variety of font styles, and unique code color schemes, making it ideal for efficient content creators on WeChat.

metadata.name: laravel-logger
metadata.description: An out the box activity logger for your Laravel or Lumen application. Laravel logger is an activity event logger for your laravel application. It comes out the box with ready to use with dashboard to view your activity. Laravel logger can be added as a middleware or called through a trait. This package is easily configurable and customizable. Supports Laravel 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, 5.6, 5.7, 5.8, 6, and 7+

summary.zh: Laravel Logger æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º Laravel æˆ– Lumen åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºæä¾›çš„å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨çš„æ´»åŠ¨æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•å™¨ã€‚å®ƒé…å¤‡äº†å¯è§†åŒ–ä»ªè¡¨æ¿ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé€šè¿‡ä¸­é—´ä»¶æˆ–ç‰¹æ€§è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œæ˜“äºé…ç½®å’Œå®šåˆ¶ã€‚è¯¥å·¥å…·å…¼å®¹ Laravel 5.3 è‡³ 9+ ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿè®°å½•ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•ã€ç™»å‡ºåŠå…¶ä»–æ´»åŠ¨äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œé€‚åˆéœ€è¦ç›‘æ§ç”¨æˆ·è¡Œä¸ºçš„åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Laravel Logger is an out-of-the-box activity logger for Laravel or Lumen applications. It features a visual dashboard and can be integrated as middleware or called via traits, making it highly configurable and customizable. Compatible with Laravel versions 5.3 to 9+, it logs user logins, logouts, and other activity events, ideal for applications needing user behavior monitoring.

metadata.name: laravel-activitylog
metadata.description: Log activity inside your Laravel app

summary.en: spatie/laravel-activitylog is a package for easily logging user activities within Laravel applications. It supports automatic logging of model events, storing all activities in the `activity_log` table. Developers can log and retrieve activities through a simple API, supporting custom properties and event logging, making it suitable for applications requiring user behavior tracking and auditing.

summary.en: This project is a web chat application built on Laravel and Swoole, supporting user login, registration, chat main panel, and one-on-one chat features. The frontend is implemented using pure CSS, HTML, and jQuery, featuring practical functionalities like a chat bot, offline messages, emojis, and image uploads, making it suitable for real-time communication in web applications.

summary.en: layuimini is a backend admin front-end template based on layui, designed to offer a simple and user-friendly development experience. Users can quickly initialize the framework by providing just one interface, supporting multiple color schemes and tabs, and is mobile-friendly, ensuring a great user experience. This template is ideal for developers looking to quickly build backend management systems.

summary.en: woann-chat is a chat system built on LaravelS and Layim, designed to provide real-time communication features. It supports user registration, friend search, group chat creation, and message push, making it suitable for developers for learning and communication. The project relies on PHP and Swoole, combined with the Laravel framework, offering high performance and scalability. Although the current version has some bugs, it is under continuous development, and community contributions are welcome.

summary.en: Composer Registry Manager is a convenient tool that allows users to quickly switch between different Composer repositories. It supports listing available repositories and filtering by geographical location, greatly facilitating dependency management for developers in various environments. The tool's main highlights include a simple command-line interface and flexible configuration options, making it ideal for developers who frequently change Composer sources.

summary.en: This project aims to provide a convenient method for enabling Kubernetes and Istio for Docker Desktop users on Mac and Windows. With simple scripts and configurations, users can easily set up and manage Kubernetes clusters, supporting multiple version switches, making it suitable for development and testing environments. The project emphasizes compliance with Docker Desktop's usage terms and offers necessary resource configuration recommendations to ensure a smooth experience with Kubernetes's powerful features.

metadata.name: laravel-log-viewer
metadata.description: :dromedary_camel: Laravel log viewer

summary.zh: Laravel Log Viewer æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè½»é‡çº§çš„æ—¥å¿—æŸ¥çœ‹å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Laravel 6 è‡³ 12 åŠ Lumenã€‚ç”¨æˆ·åªéœ€é€šè¿‡ Composer å®‰è£…å¹¶è®¾ç½®è·¯ç”±å³å¯ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚è¯¥å·¥å…·æ— å…¬å…±èµ„äº§å’Œä¾›åº”å•†è·¯ç”±ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºæœ‰æ— æ—¥å¿—è½®æ¢çš„ç¯å¢ƒï¼Œä¾¿äºå¼€å‘è€…å¿«é€ŸæŸ¥çœ‹å’Œåˆ†ææ—¥å¿—ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæå‡è°ƒè¯•æ•ˆç‡ã€‚
summary.en: Laravel Log Viewer is a lightweight log viewing tool that supports Laravel versions 6 to 12 and Lumen. Users can easily install it via Composer and set up routes for immediate use. The tool operates without public assets or vendor routes, making it suitable for environments with or without log rotation, thus enhancing developers' ability to quickly view and analyze log information for efficient debugging.

summary.en: RageFrame 2.0 is a rapid development engine based on the Yii2 framework, designed to simplify the secondary development process. Its core features include strong extensibility, modular and plugin mechanisms, support for multiple business entrances, and flexible permission control. The framework integrates third-party login and payment functionalities, provides RESTful APIs, and is suitable for building multi-end applications, significantly enhancing development efficiency. It is ideal for developers with a background in PHP and Yii2.

summary.en: The Yii2 Queue extension supports various queue backends (such as DB, Redis, RabbitMQ, etc.) for asynchronous task processing. Users can easily define job classes and push them to the queue, with support for delayed execution and status tracking, making it ideal for applications requiring efficient task scheduling.

summary.en: BFE (Beyond Front End) is a modern layer 7 load balancer from Baidu, designed to provide efficient traffic management solutions. The system consists of a data plane and a control plane, supporting multiple protocols including HTTP, HTTPS, and WebSocket. BFE offers content-based routing and load balancing capabilities, along with API management and a graphical interface, making it well-suited for cloud-native architectures, particularly in Kubernetes environments.

summary.en: NPS is a lightweight, high-performance intranet penetration proxy server that supports various protocols including TCP, UDP, HTTP(S), and SOCKS5. It is suitable for accessing intranet websites, debugging local payment interfaces, SSH access, and remote desktop scenarios. NPS features a powerful web management interface, supports multi-user registration, HTTPS integration, and various extension functions, making it compatible with Linux, Windows, and macOS, with simple configuration and robust capabilities.

summary.en: Creative Tim UI is a comprehensive component library built on shadcn/ui, designed to accelerate the development of modern web applications. It offers customizable React components and blocks that can be seamlessly integrated into Next.js projects via a CLI. The library supports Tailwind CSS and provides a rich collection of pre-built blocks suitable for various application scenarios, such as account management, billing, and marketing.

summary.en: This project implements a simple LSTM neural network for Python code autocompletion. By tokenizing Python code, the model saves over 30% of keystrokes in most files, and nearly 50% in some cases. While the current efficiency needs improvement, its potential for integration into code editors is noteworthy. The repository includes a trained model, allowing users to easily test and evaluate it through straightforward steps.

summary.en: This project provides Facebook GraphQL support for Laravel 5, compatible with Eloquent models and features Relay support, validation, and GraphiQL functionality. Although this package is no longer maintained, its design and implementation offer a solid example for developers looking to integrate GraphQL into complex APIs in Laravel applications. It is recommended to use other actively maintained Laravel GraphQL packages.

summary.en: This project is a GraphQL integration package for Laravel, based on the PHP implementation of GraphQL. It allows users to create query and mutation request endpoints, supports multiple schemas, and custom resolver middleware. Key features include per-operation authorization, dynamic field querying, pagination support, and file uploads, aimed at addressing n+1 problems and improving data loading efficiency, making it ideal for applications requiring complex data interactions.

It uses PSR/PER guidelines for formatting but does not fully comply, making it suitable for formatting pure PHP files, while mixed PHP and HTML files are still under development. Users can easily integrate it into their existing development environments with simple installation and configuration.

summary.en: laravel-admin is a tool for building full-featured administrative interfaces for Laravel, enabling rapid CRUD backend generation in just ten minutes. summary.en: shortuuid is a simple Python library that generates concise, unambiguous, and URL-safe UUIDs. It translates UUIDs to base57 encoding, avoiding similar-looking characters, making it suitable for non-sequential IDs displayed to users. The library supports custom alphabets and length settings, offering various generation methods, including name-based UUIDs and cryptographically secure random strings, ideal for diverse application scenarios.

summary.en: TabNine is an AI code completion tool that supports multiple programming languages, with a closed-source backend. Its key highlight lies in language recognition and tokenization capabilities, allowing intelligent suggestions across file extensions, enhancing developer productivity.

summary.en: Overlord is a high-availability caching service solution developed by Bilibili in Go, supporting proxy and cluster management for memcache and redis. This project is already in production use at Bilibili, demonstrating its practicality and reliability.

summary.en: AVBook is a management system designed for adult films, integrating crawlers from avmoo, javbus, and javlibrary to provide an online AV film library and magnet link database. summary.en: phpjieba is a PHP extension based on the Jieba Chinese word segmentation tool, supporting PHP5 and PHP7. It aims to provide developers with efficient Chinese word segmentation capabilities. The library offers various segmentation modes, including extraction, search cutting, and part-of-speech tagging, suitable for text analysis and natural language processing scenarios. With simple installation and configuration, users can quickly integrate this extension to enhance Chinese text processing efficiency.

The tutorials cover node subscription methods for various operating systems, catering to users needing access to international networks for academic research, foreign trade shopping, and more. The project also includes shared Apple Store accounts and recommendations for premium nodes, greatly enhancing the user's online experience.

summary.en: Biny is a high-performance lightweight PHP framework that follows the MVC pattern for rapid development of modern web applications. Its code is simple and easy to understand, supporting features like cross-library joins, RESTful, and form validation, while ensuring strong security against SQL injection and XSS attacks. With response times under 1ms, Biny is suitable for beginners and high-concurrency scenarios, offering exceptional performance and usability.

summary.en: Clockwork is a browser-based development tool for PHP developers that provides real-time insights into application runtime, including request data, performance metrics, log entries, and database queries. The server-side component collects and stores application data in debug mode, allowing users to configure features as needed. It is suitable for HTTP requests, commands, queue jobs, and tests, significantly enhancing development efficiency and debugging experience.

summary.en: Hyperf is a high-performance and flexible PHP coroutine framework designed for building microservices and middleware. Leveraging Swoole and Swow coroutine technologies, it offers exceptional processing speed and supports various common components like MySQL, Redis, and WebSocket. Hyperf emphasizes flexibility and composability, utilizing AOP and dependency injection to ensure components are pluggable, making it suitable for modern distributed applications.

summary.en: Wizard is an open-source document management tool that supports Markdown, Swagger, and table document types, aimed at enhancing team collaboration on documentation. Key features include document version history management, user permission control, document search, and LDAP authentication, making it suitable for tech teams and enterprise documentation management. Quick deployment via Docker allows users to enjoy features like auto-saving and version comparison, making it an ideal choice for managing development documentation.

summary.en: ssc is a Shell framework designed for service deployment, offering a wealth of functions and examples for one-click installation of LNMP, Redis clusters, and more. It supports bilingual usage (Chinese and English), allows custom installation directories, and is compatible with tools like Ansible, making it suitable for production environments. summary.en: EasySwoole Distributed (ESD) is a high-performance PHP coroutine framework designed to simplify the development of distributed and microservice architectures. It features a powerful plugin management system that allows flexible combinations of various plugins, significantly enhancing the framework's functionality. Additionally, it supports annotations and Aspect-Oriented Programming (AOP), enabling developers to quickly implement complex business logic. Ideal for modern web applications requiring high scalability and performance.

summary.en: WhichBrowser/Parser-PHP is a user agent parsing library for PHP. Despite its complexity making it nearly useless for browser sniffing, it can be beneficial in specific scenarios to enhance user experience or gather browser usage data. The library supports PHP 7.0 and above, providing detailed information about browsers, rendering engines, operating systems, and devices, making it suitable for developers needing precise user environment identification.

This tool is specifically designed for the TamperMonkey extension in Chrome and Safari browsers, simplifying user operations when downloading large files and enhancing the overall experience.

It allows users to quickly check code quality and coding style, supporting frameworks like Laravel, Symfony, and Magento. The tool provides a clear overview of code architecture and complexity, helping developers write reliable and clean code.

summary.en: The Composer mirror project offers a comprehensive solution for understanding and deploying Composer mirrors. Launched in 2017, it ran continuously for over two years, supporting the needs of the Laravel China community. With straightforward configuration and commands, users can easily set up their own Composer mirror, optimizing package management and download speeds, suitable for developers and teams in domestic environments.

summary.en: Consolidation\Cgr offers a safer alternative to the `composer global require` command. By installing PHP command-line tools in isolated directories, it prevents dependency conflicts between different projects, ensuring higher installation success rates. Cgr is ideal for PHP developers needing to install command-line tools globally and supports setting minimum stability for projects, enhancing flexibility and control.

summary.en: The Laravel SendGrid Driver is a library that adds a SendGrid driver to Laravel's mail configuration, supporting the SendGrid Web API. It extends the original Laravel classes, allowing users to send emails using the same methods. With simple configuration, developers can easily integrate SendGrid's email sending capabilities, making it ideal for applications requiring efficient email delivery, compatible with both Laravel and Lumen frameworks.

summary.en: Swoft is a PHP microservice coroutine framework based on the Swoole extension, featuring a built-in high-performance network server that supports HTTP, WebSocket, RPC, and TCP. It offers flexible componentization, powerful AOP, dependency injection, and service governance, making it ideal for high-performance microservice applications. With concise annotations and standard PSR implementations, Swoft serves as the Spring Cloud solution in the PHP ecosystem.

summary.en: Deployer is a PHP deployment tool that offers out-of-the-box support for popular frameworks. Its core value lies in providing automatic server provisioning and zero downtime deployments, making it ideal for development teams seeking efficient deployment solutions. The tool also includes ready-to-use recipes for most frameworks, streamlining the deployment process.

summary.en: This project offers a collection of useful Laravel server scripts and configurations designed to simplify the setup process for new servers. Users can directly utilize these scripts for quick deployment and configuration of Laravel applications, enhancing development efficiency, suitable for developers and operations personnel.

It supports remote control by administrators, allowing flexible configuration of bot behavior, making it suitable for automating WeChat social management and enhancing communication efficiency.

summary.en: This project implements the WeChat Mini Program login authorization mechanism based on Laravel and Swoole, enabling third-party platform integration. By utilizing WebSocket technology, users can efficiently receive login feedback after scanning the mini program code, avoiding traditional AJAX polling and significantly enhancing performance. The project relies on PHP, Redis, and is suitable for applications needing WeChat login integration.

summary.en: This project is an Alipay Mini Program extension package for the Laravel framework, designed to simplify the login authorization process for Alipay Mini Programs. By providing a wrapper for the Alipay OAuth interfaces, developers can easily obtain user authorization information, supporting functions like token exchange and user info retrieval. This extension addresses the lack of Composer support in the official Alipay SDK, making it suitable for Laravel developers integrating Alipay Mini Programs.

summary.en: amis is a front-end low-code framework that allows users to quickly generate various backend pages through JSON configuration, significantly reducing development costs and catering to users without front-end development experience. Its visual editor and comprehensive documentation facilitate easy onboarding and rapid application building. Developed in TypeScript, the framework supports modularity and efficient testing mechanisms, making it suitable for enterprise-level application development.

summary.en: This project is a Chinese translation of useful laws, theories, principles, and patterns for developers, covering various classic concepts such as Amdahl's Law, Moore's Law, and the KISS principle. By providing bilingual references, it aids developers in better understanding and applying these theories, enhancing software development efficiency and quality, suitable for all types of developers and tech teams.

summary.en: This real-time voting system for classes is built on thinkPHP3.2.3, aimed at providing a convenient voting solution for the School of Management. The system restricts each user to one vote via WeChat openid, ensuring fairness. Key features include a mobile voting page, real-time data display, and an admin interface, supporting captcha, real-time updates, and data monitoring, enhancing interactivity and management efficiency.

summary.en: This PHP geohash extension provides geocoding and decoding functionalities, converting latitude and longitude into geohash strings while supporting retrieval of neighboring geohash values. Its primary applications are in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and location services, enabling developers to efficiently handle geographic data. The extension is user-friendly and allows for customizable precision, making it suitable for PHP projects requiring geographic data processing.

With simple configuration, developers can easily integrate and utilize the powerful features of Flysystem, making it suitable for applications requiring cloud storage, enhancing flexibility and efficiency in file management.

summary.en: laravel-filesystem-oss is an extension package for Laravel that provides Aliyun OSS storage filesystem support, compatible with Laravel 9 and above. Based on flysystem-oss, it simplifies integration with Aliyun OSS, allowing developers to easily upload, download, and manage files. The core highlights of this package include flexible configuration options and support for multiple storage buckets, making it suitable for Laravel applications requiring efficient file storage solutions.

It supports responsive layouts, integrates Bootstrap, Sass, and Gulp, and offers a rich set of chart and map components, making it suitable for various backend management systems. Its flexibility and high-resolution design make it an ideal choice for creating user-friendly admin interfaces.

summary.en: EasyWeChat is a powerful PHP SDK for WeChat development, designed to simplify integration with the WeChat platform. It supports various application scenarios such as official accounts and mini-programs, offering a rich set of API interfaces to help developers quickly build efficient WeChat applications. Maintained by the WeChat team, it features excellent documentation and community support, making it an ideal choice for developers looking to implement WeChat functionalities.

The template is compatible with Angular Material and Nebular, making it suitable for developers to kickstart projects and save costs. The project is currently in a maintenance state, focusing primarily on updating the Angular version.

summary.en: Tabler is a free and open-source HTML Dashboard UI Kit built on Bootstrap, designed to provide a responsive and high-quality user interface. It is suitable for creating various types of admin panels, supporting mobile, tablet, and desktop devices to meet diverse user needs. The project emphasizes component customizability and user-friendliness, making it ideal for developers with basic HTML and CSS knowledge.

summary.en: SmartWiki is a document management system designed for IT teams, allowing storage and management of API documentation, database dictionaries, and more. It features project management, user management, and permission management, catering to the needs of small to medium teams. Although the author no longer maintains the project, its simplicity and Docker deployment options still provide value.

summary.en: MinDoc is a documentation management system built on Golang and the Beego framework, designed for IT teams to easily manage and share API documentation. It supports project management, user management, and permission management, making it suitable for small to medium-sized teams. MinDoc evolved from SmartWiki, transitioning from PHP to Golang for easier deployment and usability.

summary.en: This repository offers a collection of custom Docker images, primarily featuring PHP5 and PHP7 development environments, aimed at simplifying developers' workflows. With these images, users can quickly set up and manage PHP environments, enhancing development efficiency. The project also includes common Docker commands and learning resources, making it suitable for developers needing to rapidly deploy PHP applications.

summary.en: This package provides CORS header support for Laravel and Lumen applications, facilitating cross-origin request handling. While Laravel 7 and above have native CORS support, this package remains a viable solution for developers using Laravel 6 or below. Its flexible configuration supports preflight requests, making it suitable for applications requiring cross-origin resource sharing.

metadata.name: laravel-cors

summary.zh: fruitcake/laravel-cors æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º Laravel åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºæä¾› CORSï¼ˆè·¨åŸŸèµ„æºå…±äº«ï¼‰æ”¯æŒçš„ä¸­é—´ä»¶ã€‚å®ƒå…è®¸å¼€å‘è€…é€šè¿‡é…ç½®ä¸­é—´ä»¶æ¥æ·»åŠ  CORS å¤´ï¼Œå¤„ç†é¢„æ£€è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå¹¶é’ˆå¯¹ç‰¹å®šè·¯ç”±å¯ç”¨æˆ–ç¦ç”¨ CORSã€‚è™½ç„¶è¯¥åŒ…åœ¨ Laravel 9 åŠä»¥ä¸Šç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸­å·²è¢«å¼ƒç”¨ï¼Œä½†ä»é€‚ç”¨äºè¾ƒæ—§ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ Laravelï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿å¼€å‘è€…åœ¨å¤„ç†è·¨åŸŸè¯·æ±‚æ—¶æä¾›çµæ´»çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: fruitcake/laravel-cors is a middleware that adds CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) support to Laravel applications. It allows developers to configure middleware to add CORS headers, handle pre-flight requests, and enable or disable CORS for specific routes. summary.en: taro-yanxuan is the first unified multi-end instance based on Taro, covering Mini Programs, H5, and React Native, aimed at sharing development experiences from NetEase Yanxuan. The project offers practical tips and insights for multi-end development, suitable for developers to learn how to efficiently use Taro for cross-platform application development. Although the project does not implement complete functionality, it provides detailed annotations documenting the development process's key considerations and pitfalls, making it highly valuable for reference.

summary.en: Pipenv is a virtual environment management tool designed for Python developers, aimed at simplifying dependency management and environment configuration for projects. It automatically creates and manages virtual environments, using Pipfile and Pipfile.lock to ensure deterministic builds, addressing the issues of using pip and virtualenv separately. Pipenv emphasizes security, supports the latest dependency versions, and provides insights into the dependency graph, significantly optimizing the development workflow.

summary.en: ngx_lua_waf is a high-performance web application firewall based on the Lua-Nginx module, designed to prevent various network attacks such as SQL injection, XSS, and SSRF. Its lightweight design simplifies configuration and usage, making it suitable for various web environments. The project is open-source under the MIT license, offering flexible rule configuration and support for dynamic rule updates to ensure efficient security protection.

summary.en: This project offers a blacklist for programmers seeking jobs, aimed at helping job seekers identify potential employer risks. By collecting and organizing cases of misconduct by companies, users can be more cautious during their job search. The technical highlight lies in its community-driven maintenance approach, encouraging user participation in updates and discussions to ensure the timeliness and accuracy of information.

summary.en: The 12306 Smart Ticket Assistant is a Python-based ticket purchasing tool that supports features like automatic captcha recognition, login, on-time pre-sale, and intelligent backup. It aims to enhance user ticket purchasing efficiency. The project relies on a local captcha recognition model and provides email and server notifications, making it suitable for users needing quick ticket purchases. Users can simplify deployment through Docker for a fast ticket grabbing service.

summary.en: The ID card picture generator allows users to fill in information and select a profile picture to generate black-and-white and color ID cards. It supports an automatic cropping feature for solid backgrounds and allows manual adjustments. The tool relies on numpy, pillow, and opencv libraries, making it suitable for research and learning. Future plans include support for cropping from complex backgrounds, ideal for developers and researchers needing quick ID card generation.

summary.en: 500LineorLess_CN is a project aimed at translating the content of the book '500 Lines or Less' into Chinese. It covers various programming topics, including visual programming, continuous integration, and distributed systems, providing high-quality technical resources for Chinese readers. The project showcases completed translations through links and tables, facilitating quick access to relevant knowledge for readers.

summary.en: The book '500 Lines or Less' is the fourth in the 'Architecture of Open Source Applications' series, aimed at helping programmers understand design decisions and trade-offs made during coding. It explores module division, the use of inheritance versus composition, and how to anticipate program extension needs through examples of programs that solve canonical software engineering problems in at most 500 lines of code. This book is ideal for developers looking to deepen their understanding of software engineering and provides a foundation for extending or modifying existing projects.

summary.en: The JPush API PHP Client is an official SDK provided by JPush for PHP, designed to simplify access to the JPush REST API. Supporting PHP versions from 5.3.3 to 7.x, it offers functionalities such as push notifications, reporting, and device management, making it suitable for PHP developers looking to implement push services. Its straightforward API design and abundant example code enable quick integration.

summary.en: Scrapyd is a service for deploying and running Scrapy spiders. It provides a JSON API for uploading Scrapy projects and controlling their spiders, making it suitable for efficiently managing web scraping tasks. Built on Python, it offers flexible spider scheduling and monitoring, enhancing automation and control in data extraction.

This SDK offers efficient interface calling methods, suitable for e-commerce application development, enabling developers to quickly implement Pinduoduo functionalities and enhance development efficiency.

summary.en: This repository provides test data for geoip_server, aimed at helping developers validate and debug geolocation services. By offering real geographical data, users can effectively test their applications' geolocation features, ensuring accuracy and reliability of the services. This project is suitable for development scenarios requiring geographical data, particularly for applications related to user location.

summary.en: elasticsearch-head is a web front-end tool for managing and visualizing data in Elasticsearch clusters. It can be run through various methods, including a local server, Docker, or as a Chrome extension, ensuring compatibility with different Elasticsearch versions. Key features include an intuitive interface and flexible connection options, enabling users to easily monitor and manage their Elasticsearch clusters.

summary.en: funNLP is a comprehensive Chinese natural language processing resource library, covering various functionalities such as sensitive word detection, language recognition, information extraction, and text generation. It offers a wealth of tools and datasets suitable for academic research, industrial applications, and developers' daily needs. The project's technical highlights include various pre-trained models, sentiment analysis tools, and knowledge graph construction capabilities, making it ideal for implementing and exploring various NLP tasks.

The library supports multiple Redis versions and provides a straightforward API for data operations. Key features include support for the RESP3 protocol and optional hiredis performance optimization, making it suitable for Python developers needing efficient data access.

summary.en: This repository provides a PEM format backup of the Mozilla CA bundle, extracted and converted at regular intervals. Serving as a backup to the automated service on the curl website, users can access the latest CA certificate information to ensure secure connections. The project primarily supports applications relying on CA certificates, ensuring they can obtain the latest certificate data during updates.

summary.en: This is a simple graphical captcha component developed for Laravel 5, aimed at enhancing application security. It provides an easy-to-use API for generating and validating captchas, allowing developers to customize settings such as captcha length, character set, and image styles. Ideal for web applications needing to prevent automated attacks, effectively improving security during user registration and login.

summary.en: This project offers a simple and easy-to-use captcha service for Laravel 5 and above, supporting custom settings and various usage modes (such as session mode and stateless mode). After installation via Composer, users can easily integrate captcha functionality into their Laravel applications to enhance form security. Built on the Laravel framework, it offers various features such as number-to-Chinese conversion, string reversal, and sensitive word detection, making it suitable for poetry enthusiasts and developers.

summary.en: This project offers an efficient JavaScript decoding tool designed to simplify and optimize the data decoding process. Its core features include support for multiple encoding formats, fast parsing, and data conversion, making it suitable for web applications and services that require handling encoded data. The technical highlights include a simple API and high-performance decoding algorithms that significantly enhance development efficiency.

metadata.name: TrustedProxy
metadata.description: Laravel Proxy Package for handling sessions when behind load balancers or other intermediaries.

summary.zh: Laravel Trusted Proxies æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºå¤„ç†åœ¨è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡å™¨æˆ–å…¶ä»–ä¸­ä»‹åé¢æ—¶çš„ä¼šè¯çš„ Laravel ä»£ç†åŒ…ã€‚é€šè¿‡è®¾ç½®å—ä¿¡ä»»çš„ä»£ç†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç¡®ä¿åœ¨åå‘ä»£ç†åï¼ŒURL ç”Ÿæˆã€é‡å®šå‘ã€ä¼šè¯å¤„ç†å’Œæ—¥å¿—è®°å½•çš„å‡†ç¡®æ€§ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«é€‚ç”¨äºä½¿ç”¨ Nginxã€HAProxy ç­‰è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡å™¨çš„åº”ç”¨ã€‚è¯¥åŒ…ç®€åŒ–äº†é…ç½®è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œä½¿å¼€å‘è€…èƒ½å¤Ÿè½»æ¾ç®¡ç† HTTP è¯·æ±‚çš„çœŸå®æ¥æºï¼Œç¡®ä¿åº”ç”¨çš„å®‰å…¨æ€§å’Œæ­£ç¡®æ€§ã€‚
summary.en: Laravel Trusted Proxies is a proxy package for Laravel that handles sessions when behind load balancers or other intermediaries. By setting trusted proxies, it ensures accurate URL generation, redirection, session handling, and logging when operating behind reverse proxies like Nginx or HAProxy. This package simplifies the configuration process, allowing developers to easily manage the real source of HTTP requests, ensuring application security and correctness.

metadata.name: redis

metadata.name: PocketFlow

summary.en: PocketFlow is an open-source framework designed to compress and accelerate deep learning models with minimal human intervention, enhancing inference efficiency for AI applications. The framework supports various model compression algorithms, allowing developers to specify desired compression or acceleration ratios, while PocketFlow automatically selects appropriate hyper-parameters to generate efficient compressed models, suitable for mobile devices with limited computational resources. Its simplified toolkit broadens the applicability of deep learning models across various domains.

summary.en: The '500 Questions on Deep Learning' book explores core knowledge in deep learning and related fields through a Q&A format, covering probability theory, linear algebra, machine learning, and computer vision. It is suitable for researchers, students, and interviewers. The book is comprehensive and rich in content, consolidating the expertise of many professionals, aiming to enhance readers' practical application skills and interview preparation. It is ideal for learners at all levels, especially job seekers looking to fill knowledge gaps.

summary.en: SOAR (SQL Optimizer And Rewriter) is an automated SQL optimization and rewriting tool developed by Xiaomi. It supports cross-platform usage and focuses on optimizing MySQL syntax. Key features include heuristic algorithm optimization, multi-column index optimization for complex queries, detailed EXPLAIN information interpretation, and custom rule rewriting, making it ideal for developers and DBAs looking to enhance SQL performance.

The project is actively maintained and welcomes community participation to enhance features and optimizations.

October CMS offers intuitive installation and learning resources, supporting plugin extensions, making it ideal for developers looking to quickly set up websites.

summary.en: RESP.app is a GUI tool for Redis aimed at enhancing the developer experience and productivity when working with Redis. Its intuitive interface and rich features enable developers to manage and query data more efficiently.

It supports both synchronous and asynchronous APIs, compatible with multiple MongoDB versions (4.0 to 8.0), and implements BSON format and GridFS. PyMongo follows semantic versioning, making it suitable for Python developers needing efficient database operations.

summary.en: The DingTalk intranet penetration tool offers a convenient way for developers to conduct testing without a public domain or IP. It supports both HTTP and database tunneling, allowing users to quickly start with simple configurations. While the tool is useful for temporary use, it is not suitable for production environments, which require real public IPs or domains. The latest Stream mode is recommended for security compliance.

Its TypeScript support and comprehensive documentation enable developers to quickly integrate it into existing projects.

summary.en: Baum is a library that implements the Nested Set pattern for Laravel's Eloquent ORM. By handling complex SQL operations, Baum simplifies the insertion, movement, and deletion of nodes, significantly enhancing the efficiency of tree data management. This library is compatible with Laravel 5 and above, providing quick access to nodes and their descendants.

It supports two popular image manipulation extensions, GD and Imagick, featuring an interchangeable driver architecture, support for animated images, and framework-agnostic compatibility. This library adheres to PSR-12 standards, making it ideal for PHP developers needing image processing capabilities.

summary.en: AetherUpload-Laravel is a Laravel package designed for uploading large files, featuring chunked uploads, resumable uploads, instant uploads, and distributed deployment. summary.en: Swoole is a high-performance concurrency library for PHP, based on coroutines and employing an event-driven, asynchronous programming model that significantly enhances PHP's concurrency capabilities. It is ideal for building high-performance network services and real-time applications, such as HTTP servers and WebSocket services. The key features of Swoole include efficient coroutine scheduling and support for blocking I/O, enabling developers to easily implement concurrent tasks.

The package integrates seamlessly with Laravel's authorization system, making it suitable for applications requiring fine-grained permission management, such as content management systems and enterprise applications.

summary.en: Simple Cache is an easy-to-use caching trait for Laravel's Eloquent models. By adding the Cacheable trait to a model, developers can effortlessly implement data caching with a default duration of 30 minutes, while also allowing customization of cache length and storage. The library includes cache busting mechanisms to ensure data consistency, making it ideal for applications requiring efficient data retrieval.

It comes with built-in features like a CoreUI-based backend, Spatie/Permission authorization, Bootstrap 4 frontend, Two Factor Authentication, user/role management, and more. summary.en: react-iztro is a React component based on iztro, designed to generate Zi Wei Dou Shu astrolabes with integrated powerful AI interpretation capabilities. summary.en: XiaohongshuSkills is a command-line tool for automating content publishing, commenting, and retrieval on Xiaohongshu. Utilizing the Chrome DevTools Protocol, it supports multi-account management, headless operation, and content data scraping, making it ideal for content creators and marketers. The tool automates title and body filling, image uploads, and hashtag insertion, significantly enhancing content management efficiency on Xiaohongshu.
